column3: Yesus Kirstoosi ba shempo nu gish aaththi immida gish siiqoy azakkonne nu hessan eroos. Nukka nu shempo nu ishata gish aaththi immanas nuus bessees.
He wodeykka Ayhudata Paaziga ba7aaleppe kase Yesusi hayssa alameza yeddidi Aawakko baana saatey gakkidayssa erides; hayssa alamezan diza ba baggata wursi siiqides. Wursethi gakkanaasikka dosides.
Xoossi ista bolla oyddu tammu laytha hanqettidayti isti oonantee? Nagara ooththin ista ahay bazzo biittan kundi attidayta gidettennee?
Inte azazettiza nayta gididi eronta dishe inte kase izan diza iita qofa kaallofte.
Xoossi wursikka maaranas asi wurikka azazettonta mala gordides.

Oyddu do7ata giddofe yida misatiza qaala siyadis; he giirissayka “Bagga kilo gidiza giste issades issi gallasa damoza; qasse issi kilo kumana sayso pace gidiza bangay issi gallasa damoza gido. Gido attin zaytenne woyne mith qohoppa” gishin ta siyadis.
Goda sinthan inte intena kawushshite; qasse izi intena dhoqu dhoqu histana.
Izi ba doosiddadde baggara biitta bolla xillotethan pirdana gallas bare woththides. Izakka hayqoppe denthidi asa ubbas hayssa tumatetha erissides.
Wotadaratikka aguntha zawude xaaxidi Yesusa hu7en woththida; zo7o kaabaka mayzida.
Hessa gish azinati hayqqida naatetha macasati adde gelana mala, nayta yelana malanne baso as ayssana mala, morkeyka ista bolla woththiza miishe demmoonta mala ta zorays.
Tani Aawan diza mala, Aawayka tanan dizayssa inte ammanite; akay giikko ta ooththiza oosota gishikka tana ammanite.
Hayqoynne Duufoy tama abba giddo yegetida. He tama abbazi nam7antho hayqo.
Hessa mala gidizakko Kirstoosi alamey medhetosappe haa simmin daro wode meto ekkanas bessees; ha7i qasse wode wursethan bana yarshidi nagara digganas wursethas issito qoncides.
Oyddu tammu layth kumeth ista bazzo biittan dandayides. †*
Hessa gish ta ishato! Inte maana shiiqiza wode issoy issara naagetite.

Hessafe guye he dorsay usupuntho maatameza doyin tani gede izakko xeelladis; hekko Biittay wolqama qaath qaaxides. Awa arshey asi kayos may7iza karetha may7o mala karexxides. Aginayka kumeththara suutha mala zo7adus. *
Macasatas hayqqidayti paxida; baggayti qasse hessafe aadhdhiza hayqoppe denthi demmanas giidi hayqoppe atethi leqqidi hayqos bana aaththi immida; waayeppe attanas koybetenna. *

Phawuloosi qas “Nu Oroome yeleteth gidishin pirday baynda dere sinthan durqara bukkidinne qasho keeththan yeggida. Histin ha7i qas nuna qotara asi eronta kessana koyizoo? Hessi hanenna; isti yiidi barka birshetto!” gides.
“Laymatoppa, wodhoppa, amottofa” gizaytinne hara azazoti diikkokka “As ubbakka ne mala siiqa” giza hanno issi wogan wurikka kuuyettides. *
Hayssa izan hidota ooththizay wuri izi geesh gidida mala bana geeshshees.
Tani ta gaaththara Xoossa wogan ufayetays.
Ay wodekka Godan ufayetite. Qasseka ta intena ufayetite gays.
Hessa taas ooni yootidakkonne erana gaada ta guye yuuya xeelliza wode xompe ista bolla woththiza worqafe oosettida laapun ballata beyadis.
Izas azazettonta ixidaytappe attin iza shemposo gelonta mala izi caaqi diggiday haray oonantee?
Taappe kase yidayti wuri kaysonne bonqizayta. Dorsati gidikko isti giza siybetenna
Inteno Asas ooththi aqizayto! Intena oosissiza godatas bonchon azazetite. Inte azazettanay lo7otasinne ashketas xalala gidonta hanko iitatassarakko!
Iza bolla “Hayssi addezi hayssa Xoossa Keeththa bollanne woga bolla cashsha qaala haasaya mulekka aggibenna.
Hessi wuri haniday izi nuna banara Kirstoosa baggara maqaynthidinne maqayntho ooso nuus immida Xoossana.
Ta ishato! Goda sunthan intes yootida nabeta waayetethinne ista dandaya intes leemiso histi xeellite.
Goda sunth xeygizay wuri attana’ gides.
“Amiin! Sabay, gitateththi, erateththi, galatay, bonchoy, wolqaynne minotethi nu Godas Xoossas mernappe mernaas gido. Amiin!” gida.
Inte lo7etethi coo mela hu7e daththaninne worqan geexetethan, al7o mayo may7on, coo mela ayfen beettiza geexen gidoppo. *
Hessa gish Goda gish markatanas woykko Goda gish qashetida tanan yeellatoppa. Gido attin Xoossa wolqara mishiraachcho qaala gish tanara meto ekka.
Isti tumappe nees dumma as gidida mala tanikka tana ista gish dummassays.
Beegga! Hayqqana matidayssanne nees wurashe guuth attida wolqayo zaara mintha. Tani ta Goda sinthan ne oosoy kumeth gidin beyabeekke.
Heedzdzantho kiitanchay ba xu7aza shaafata bollanne pulto haaththata bolla gussides. He istika suuth gidida.
Hayssa ha ammanozan minni diza kiyatethan nuni geliday iza baggara gidida gish ufayssan Xoossa boncho gishetti ekizayta gidida gish nu ufayoos.
Qasseka inte laymatizaytas woykko tunatas woykko uuzetizaytassinne eqqas goynnizaytas Kirstoosa kawoteththaninne Xoossa Kawoteththan istas laatasoy bayndayssa inte erite.
Abrahaamey baas laata biitta ekkanas xeeygetida wode ammanon azazetides. Awa bizakkonne eronta aggikkokka ero giidi bides. *
Ayanay kumidayta gidite attin mathosiza ushshan mathotofte. Hessi mela miisha laaleththa.
Hessa geedon daro asay yeelachiza ista ogeza kaallees. He ista oosoza geedon tuma ogey cayettes.
Nu wurikka iza baggara issi Ayanan Aawa ach shiiqana.

Hinko Ayzaabetappe ammanidayta gish gidikko ‘Eeqqas shukettidi tunidayssa mooppite, suuthika uyoppite, bawuta hayqqida mehe asho mooppite, laymafe haakkite’ giidi cimati qachida qaala dabdaabe xaafidi nu istas yeddidos.” *

Qasse Phexroosi “Haysso Hananiya! Neni Xillo Ayana bolla wordotanassinne gade miishafe ashshana mala Xala7ey ays ne woznan gelidee? Bayzanappe kase gadezi neyssa gidenee? Ne bayzidappe guye qasse miishay ne kushen deenee? Histin ne hayssa mala wosta ne woznan qoppadii? Ne Xoossa bolla wordotadassa attin asa bolla gidenna” gides.
Hessa gish abba bolla dendiza gote carkoy heenne ha shocechiza mala dumma dumma timirte carkon asa geneninne baleththon ane nuni heenne ha phonqetishe qeeri guutha nayta mala hanokko.
Makalanchati Xoossa kawoteth gelontayssa ereketii? Hessa mala yo7on balettofte. Laymatana qaqatizayti, eeqa eqqizaytinne addey addera laymatizayti,

Ane nu ubba gallas issoy issara gakki gakki issoy issa minthethos attin issi issi asati shiiqo aggida mala ane nuni shiiqoza aggokko; harappeka Goda Yesusi matatidayssa qoppishe kaseppe minni shiiqite.
Hessa gish intes biitta bolla diza amoteth diggite. Heytikka layma, tunateth, asho amo, iita amotethinne eeqas goynno mala gidida gaphigapho.
Nu qas gallasa asata gidida gish ammanonne siiqo, tiran may7iza xurure may7o mala may7idi atotetha hidota hu7en woththiza birata qoobe mala hu7en woththidi ane nunatetha haaridi de7oos. *
Xoossi nuus nuni nu hu7e haaranas Xoossa wolqa eranasinne siiqettana Ayana immides attin babo ayana immibenna.
“Ta iza erays” gishe iza azazo polontade gidikko hessadey wordo asa attin tumay izaden deenna.
Hessa wode iza oykkanas koyda; Gido attin buro wodey gakkibeenna gish oonikka oykkibeenna.
Lo7o ooththana malanne lo7o ooson dureta gidana mala, kiyatanne shaakki immanas dosizayta gidana mala asa azaza.
Isti qasse “Hayssi addezi iita ooththontade gididakko nu iza nees aaththi immokkoshin” gida

Issi gallassi hara gallassafe dummassi qoppizadey izi hessa ooththizay Goda bonchos gidikko mizadeyka Goda bonchos giidi mees. Miidi Xoosse galattees. Montadeyka Goda bonchos giidi muus aggessinne Xoossas galata imees.
Hidotan ufayetizayta gidite; meto dandayite; woossan minnite.
Phawuloosa naagiza mato halaqay “Iza daro waayssonta lo7etha naaga; iza laggeti izas koshshiza miishi ekki yiikko diggofa” gides.
Siiqoy ubba wode dandayees. Ubba wodekka ammanees. Ufays ooththessinne minni eqees.
Kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala “Ta ammanida gish haasayadis” geetettidaysa nuka hessa he ammano Ayanan ammaniza gish hasayos. *
Ta ishato! Nu intena “Ooso ooththonta asata hanqettite; babbizayta minisite; daaburanchata maaddite; as ubba dandayite” gi zoroos.
Ichashantha kiitanchay ba xu7a do7aza alga bolla gussides. He do7aza Kawotethi qas dhumides. Asay qas waayezappe dendidayssan barka ba inxars garcides.
Hayssa ha azazoza kaalliza ubbatasinne Xoossa dere gidida Isra7eele asatas sarotethinne maaroteth gido.
Izi Goda oge tamaridadenne Yesusa gish balay baynda haasayizadenne Xillo Ayanan xuugetishe tamarsizade; gido attin izi lo7ethi erizay Yohannisa xinqate xalala.
Histikko inte ay miikkoka, ay uyikkoka woykko aykko ooththikko wursikka Xoossa bonchos ooththite.

Inte qasse izappe ekkida Xillo Ayanay intenan diza gish haray oonikka intena tamarsanas bessenna. Izi intena tamarsanayssi tumu attin wordo gidenna; Hessa gish Xillo Ayanay intena tamarsida mala Kirstoosan de7ite.
Shempofe shaaketida ashoy hayqeth gidida mala oosoppekka shaaketida ammanoy hayqetha.
Izi hessa gidappe guye kath ekkidi Xoosse galatidi asa ubba sinthan kathi muus oykkides.
Gido attin eeqas yarshettidi tunida kath mooppite; laymappe haakkite; bawuti hayqqida mehe asho mooppite; suuth uyoppite giidi nu istas xaafana bessees. *
Heerakka Phawuloosi Hananiya “Haysso aannora tiyettida keeththazo! Nenakka Xoossi shocana; wogara pirdana uttada wogay baynda tana shocana mala azazay?” gides. *
Hessa gish Yesus Kirstoosa ammanizayta bolla pirday deenna.
Xoossi nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara atoteth demmana mala attin nuna hanqos xeygibenna.
Alame bolla dizayti heytikka Googenne Magooge geetettizayta baleththanasinne ista olas ekki baanas kezana; heytanta qooday abba achchan diza ace mala. *
Intefe issi issi asati heytanta mala shin ha7i qas Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthaninne nu Xoossa Ayanan mecettideta; dummatidetanne xillideta.

Tani meto beyizaykka hessa gishassa. Gidikkokka ta oona ammanizakkone tani ta ammanizade shaaka eriza gish izan yeellatikke. Ta izas immida hadara he gallassiya gakkanaas izi naaganas dandayizayssa ta shaaka eradis.
Woossan ay hanonka Ayanan woossite. Hessa qoppidi beeggite; ammanizayta ubba gish qanxonta woassite.
Phawuloosappe, Silwaanooseppenne Ximtoosappe; Xoossa Aawasinne Goda Yesus Kirstoosayta gidida Tasolonqen diza ammaniza asas nu Aawa Xoossafenne Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethinne saroteth intes gido.*
Inte kiyatethi asa ubba achchan ereto. Goday yaana matides.
Hayssa uketha inte miza wodenne hayssa ushshakka uyiza ubba wode Goday yaana gakkanaas inte iza hayqo yootana.
Ammanon woossida woossay hargidade pathana. Godayka iza denthana. Izi nagara ooththidade gidikkokka Xoossi iza maarana.
Pacey baynda gallassinne qamma ne gish woossan qofisashe kase Aawati ooththida mala geeshsha woznara ta gooynniza Xoossa ta galatays.
Zumatanne zaallatakka “Nuna kammite! Alga bolla uttidayssa sinthafe, he dorsaza hanqofe nuna qottite.*

“Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa haythi dizadey siyo! Xoonidades ta qotan diza mannafe immana. Izi taas gididayssa bessanas iza bolla ooratha sunthi xaafetida booththa shuch izas ta immana. Hessaka ekkidadefe attin hara asi oonikka erenna. *
Heyti wordo astamareti miishas gaphigaphiza gish barka medhi ekkida yo7o yooti yootidi intes dizaz baas bonqi ekkettes. Beni beni wodesoppe pirday istas giigeti uttides. Addafe ista dhayoy naagees.
Hessa geedon isti wordo yo7o ammanana mala Xoossi ista bolla bala ooso kiittana.
Hessika “Inte geedon Xoossa sunthi Ayzaabeta achchan cayeettes” geetetti xaafettida mala hanides. *
Iyaneessinne Iyanbaraassi Muse bolla dendida mala haytikka ista qofay mooretin erays ammanoppe kundida gish tumateth ixettes. *
Tani ta dosizayta wursa hanqayssinne qaxayays; hessa gish neni minna; maarotethanka gela. *
Histikko nuni ammanon xillida gish nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus Xoossara saroteth dees.
Ne duussa gishshinne ne tamarsiza timirtezas naageta, haytan minna. Ne hessa ooththikko nenanne ne gizayssa siyizayta ashshana.

Daro wode Ayhudata Woosa Keeththati dizason awanka isti qaaxayettana malanne ba ammano kadana mala ooththadis; ista bolla daro hanqetadakka Isra7eeleppe karen diza hara katamataka baada ammanizayta gooddadis.
Asho oosoy qoncen eretes; hessikka laymateth, tunateth, layma kaas,
Hessa gish dichchizay Xoosse attin tokkizadeykka, haaththe ushshizadeykka aykkokka gidettenna.
Hessa gish inte Yesus Kirstoosi qoncana gallas naagishin Ayana imotethatappe aykkoykka intes paccenna.

Saloppe wolqama piissa haaththa giirissinne wolqama daada giiris misatiza giirisikka siyadis. Tani siyida giirissay diithi misatiza bagana geetettizayssa diixidi asay sisiza giirissa mala giirizayssa.
Iza ammanidadey wuri iza sunthan nagara maaretidi geeyanayssa nabeti izas markatettes” gi yooto doommides.
Lo7o ooso aggonta ooththidi boncho sabanne merna de7o koyizaytas merna de7o immana.

Iisiyan diza laapun Woosa Keeththatas Kasekka dizayssafe, ha7ikka dizayssafenne, * burokka yaana Xoossafe iza alga sinthan diza laapun ayanatappe hessathoka hayqoppe denthan bayra gididayssafe, ha biitta kawotas kawonne ammanettida marka gididayssafe, nuna siiqizayssafenne ba suuthan nuna nu nagarappe geeshshida Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido. *
Phawuloosikka istas “Yohannisa xinqatay gidikko asay maarotethan simmidayssa bessiza xinqatakko! Yohannisi ba baggara asay izappe guyera yiza Yesusa ammanana mala yootides” gides. *

Histin hessi wurikka hessa mala gidikko Goday baas goynnishe diza asata paaceppe ashshanayssanne nagaranchataka wosti qaxayanakkonekka pirda gallassas wosti ista naagidi gaththanakkonne hessa izi erees guussa.
Ha7i hessafe aadhdhiza pude salon diza dere laamotettes. Hessa gish Xoossi istas salon katama giigissida gish “Ista xalla Xoossa” geetetti xeeygetanas yeellatibenna.
Xoosse bonchisonta go7ay baynda hayssi7eppenne cima macasata hayssi7eppe haakkada tuma ayana oosos ne asateth giigissa.
Isti kumeththa biitta bolla laalettidi geeshshati dizasoyo dosettida katamayo giddoththida shin saloppe wodhdhida tamay ista dippi histi xuugides.
Hessa gish Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan xammaqettana mala azazides. Hessafe guye Phexroosi guuththa wode istara daana mala woossida.
ne qooqeta kaaleththizade; dhuman dizaytas poo7o gididayssa ne ammanettidade gidikko
Merna de7oy izi nuus immana gida hidota qaala.
Saloppe gidida eratethaya gidikko koyro geeshsha, guyeppekka saroteth dosizaaro, dandayizaaro, ero gizaaro, maarotethinne lo7o ayfey kumidaaro; qasse wordo maadontaaronne ulon geney bayndaaro.
“Aaway ba naa dosees. Haniza yo7o wursi iza kushen aaththi imees. *
Issi issi asatas misatiza mala Goday ba yootida hidota qaala polanas gam7enakko shin asi wurikka maarettana malanne ay asikka dhayonta mala koydi izi inte gish takkes.
Asi wuri ta mala macho ekkonta dizaakko ta dosays. Gido attin issi issi asas Xoossafe imettida dumma imotay dees. Issas dumma issi imotay dees. Hankoyssas qas hara imotay dees.
Siiqo kaallite; ayana imotethata harappeka tinbite haasayiza imotata lo7ethi koyite.
Kirstoosa sinthan Xoossi ba boncho eratetha poo7o nuus immanas “Poo7oy dhuman poo7o” gida Xoossi ba poo7o nu woznan poo7isides. *
He wode issi Iskindiriya kataman yeletida Aphilosa geetettiza issi Ayhuda asi Efesoone yides; izikka tamaridadenne Geeshsha Maxaafata lo7ethi erizade.
Hessathoka Yesusi ba suutha baggara asa geeshshanas katama pengefe Karen meto beyides.
Hessa gish ne tamarsanayti heytanta. Hessaka ne kumeththa godateththara zoranne hanqa; nena oonikka leqqofo.
Xoossay nu giddon ba siiqo qoncisiday nu iza baggara de7o demmana mala ba naa issineza ha duge ha alamezan yeddidayssanna.
“Ta Aawawu! Ne tana hayssi alamey medhetanappe kase dossida gish ne taas immida ta bonchoza isti beyana mala hayta ne taas immidaytikka ta dizason tanara daana mala dosays.
Ista ogen dhayoynne laafateth dees.
Hessa gish pude salo bida Qeeseta halaqa Xoossa Naa Yesusi nuus diza gish ane nuni nu ammano minthi oykkos.
“Tani izan ufayetizadey ta dosiza ta naazi hayssa” giza qaala giirissay gita bonchora izas yida wode izi Xoossa Aawappe bonchonne gitateth ekides.
Heyti wurikka he issi Ayanay immiza imota gidishin issi issi asas ba koyda mala immees.

Oydantho kiitanchay ba zayeza punnides; awa arshes cigoy, aginas cigoy, xoolintetas cigoy shocettides; hessa gish heytanta poo7oppe cigoy dhumides; hessa malanka gallassafe cigoy omars gidides. Hessathoka omarsappe cigoy poo7oy baynda dhuma gidides. *
He wode wurikka Ayhuda Woosa Keeththa halaqa Sostineese geetettizayssa oykkidi pirda keeththa sinthan bukkida; Galyoossi gidikko hessa wudanka yeggibenna.
Qasseka isti iza oykkanas koyda shin izi ista kusheppe kessi ekki bides.
Hessa gish nu hidota qanxokko; nuus kare bagga asatethay dhay dhay biikkoka nuus gaaththa bagga asatethay gallas gallas ooraxi ooraxi baasi.
Maarama daro al7o waagara shametida bagga litro gidiza geeshsha nardoose shitto ekka yaada Yesusa toho bolla guussada tohoza ba hu7e binanara quccadus. Keeththakka shitto sawoy kumides. *
Alaga biittan bete asa mala buro nees imettana geetettida biittan ammanon uttides. Izas imettida hidota qaala izara issife laattana Yisaaqa malanne Yaqoobe mala dunkanen de7ides. *
Ta ishato! Ane inte ta haniza mala tana kaallitenne haratarakka issife de7ite. Nu nuna intes leemiso histi bessida mala diza asata woznan woththite. *
Inte issoy issa deexxo tooho tookkite; hessa mala ooson Kirstoosa woga poleeta.
Hessa gish asi ammanon xalala gidonta oosonka xillizayssa inte beyeeta. *
Histin nu ha7i ay giinoo? Xoossi bessonta ogera maaddi erizee? Mulekka maaddi erenna.
Inte garsan ammanon buro minnontade shiishshi ekkite attin iza qofa bolla pirdofte.
Salo bolla olay dendides. Mikaaleynne iza kiitanchati dawezara olettida. Dawezinne iza kiitanchatikka zaaridi mikaaleranne iza kiitanchatara olettida. *
Hanqettite shin nagara ooththofte; inte hanqon dishin awa arshey wullofo. *
Anjite attin istas iita cashshas cash zaaroppite. Inte xeeygetiday hessatho ooththidi anjo laattanassa.
Tana kiittidayssi izi tanara dees. Ay wodekka ta ufayssizaz ooththiza gish izi tana xalala yeggi aggibenna” gides.
Hessa gish inte xeessan tuma zinnare mala dancettidi xillotetha xurureta mala tiran may7idi,**

Neni ta ushacha kushen beyida laapun xoolintetanne xompe ista bolla woththiza worqafe oosettida laapun ballata xuuray hekko hayssa. Laapun xoolinteti laapun Woosa Keeththata kiitanchata. Xompe ista bolla woththiza laapun worqa ballati laapun Woosa Keeththata.
Gido attin Xoossa kiyatethan asa ubba gish hayqqanas kiitanchatappe guutha wode guuxida Yesusi waaye hayqo hayqqidi ha7i bonchonne galata zawude ba hu7en woththidayssa nu beyoos.
Xoossi intes azazeteth immishe ba qofa wurseth gakkanaas inte giddon ooththes.
Hayssa ta intes yootizay ta ufayssi intenan gidana malanne inte ufaysika kumeth gidanassa.
Nuna ashshida Xoossan, nuus hidota gidida Yesus Kirstoosa azazon Hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe
Hessathoka macasati bonchora bana shiishshi ekkidi bessiza may7o may7eto, attin ba hu7e daddi ekkidi woykko al7o may7o, worqanne inqu aaththidi walq walq gooppetto. *
Hessa beyidi wodoro xurqafeppe dooqqi ekkidi asanne booratakka Xoossa Keeththa gibbefe kessides; miish laammizayta miishakka dharcidi ista xaraphezatakka shiri shiri yeggides.
Hessika Xoossi kase koyro giigissi woththida lo7o ooso nuni ooththana mala Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuni nam7antho medhetidaytanne Xoossa medhetethata.
Ta siiqoto! Inte tama mala paaciza meto giddon geliza wode hessa malay kase baynda ooratha miishi gakkidaz intes misatin malaletofte.
Dorsaza sarge gallassi gakkida gishshinne iza mishiraya giigeta uttida gish haa yiite; ane ufayetoos! Ane ufayssan iza bonchoos.
Atoteth birata qoobe mala hu7en woththite. Ayana giththa mashsha oykkite; hessikka Xoossa qaala. *
Izikka issi Gibxe asi Muse bagga asappe issade bolla qoho gaththishin beyidi ba bagga addeza maadides; he Gibxe addeza wodhidi he qohetidayssa halo kessides.
Inte gidikko ta ishato! Lo7o ooso ooththanappe mulekka azaallofte.
Beeggite! Ammanon minni eqqite; minnite; goobte.

Harappeka inte goynnanaso ooththida eeqa Molooke dunkananne inte eeqa Rafaanne xoolinte misileza dhoqu dhoqu histi oykkideta. Hessa gish ta intena inte dizasoppe denthada Babiloonera aaththa yeddana’ geetettidi xaafettides.
Hessa gish ta ishato! Inte minni eqqite, nu nu duunan gidin woykko kiitan woykko nu intes aaththi yeddida timirteza lo7ethi oykkite.
Hessas nuna giigissiday Xoossa. Buro yaanayssas waase gidana mala nuus ba Ayana immiday iza.
Macassi co7u gaada kumeththara azazeteth tamaru.
Nam7u markay woykko heedzdzu markay markatonta dishin cima bolla shiiqiza mooto ekkofa. *
Issoy issa yeeri yeer ekkidi saroketite. Kirstoosan ammaniza Woosa Keeththa asay wurikka intena saro gees.

Ba hu7en gudulla qolidi yeekkishenne muuzotishe “Abba bolla markabey dizayti wurikka izi miishen duretidayti, hinna gita katamaya issi saate giddon mulera dhayda gish izis Aayye-ana! Aayye-ana!” gi waassida. *
Nuni Xoossa nayta geetettana mala Aaway darsi siiqida iza siiqoy nuus ay mala gitakkone ane beyite! Tumukka nu iza nayta. Alamey nuna eronta aggiday iza eronta aggida gishassa.

Hessathoka inteno naatethato! Inte cimatas azazetite. Inte wurikka ashketeth afala mala may7idi issoy issas ooththite. “Xoossi otorizayta ixees. Ashketas qasse ba kiyateth imees” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides. *
Mulekka diggenna! Asi wurikka wordancha “Neni ne qaalappe dendidayssan tumancha; pirdanka xoonizade gidaasa” hessatho geetetti xaafettida mala Xoossi qasse tumancha. *
Izi haa yiday ne suntha xeygizayta wursi qachanas Qeeseta halaqatappe godateth ekkidikko” gides.

Gido attin beni wode wordo nabeti dereza giddon dizayssa mala hessathoka ha7i inte giddon wordo astamareti de7andettes. Heytanti asa dhayssiza wordo timirte qotara diccana mala ooththetes. Bana ashshida Godakka kaddidi bana eeson dhayssizaz ba bolla eheetes.
Hessa gaason Ayhudata daannati Yesusa wodhana mala kaseppe aaththi dentheththida. Qasse izi Sambata moorida gish xalla gidonta “Xoossi ta Aawa” gida gishshinne bana Xoossara ginisida gishassa.
Inte taas wursi qoppiza gishshinne taappe ekkida timirteza lo7ethi oykkida gish ta intena galatays.
Dawuteykka iza gish ‘Tani Goda ubba wode ta sinthan beyays; izi ta ushachan dees; mulekka hirgike.
Inte nam7antho yeletiday mernas minni diza dhayonta de7o Xoossa qaalan dhayonta zerethafe attin dhayiza zerethafe gidenna.
Hessa gish inteka inte garsan issoy issara inte nagara paaxetite; paxana mala issoy issas woossite. Xillo asa woossay wolqara dees; wolqama oosokka ooththees.
Ta intes tuma gays; tanan ammanida asas merna de7oy dees.
“Aawaynne aaya baynda nayta mala ta intena xalala aggikke; ta simmada ha inteko yaana.
Awarakka gidin go7ay daro. Harappe koyro Xoossa qaalay hadara Ayhudatas imettides.
Oosanchato inte Kirstoosas azazettiza mala biitta bolla intena ooththisizaytas yashshatethaninne bonchon suure woznappe azazetite.
Woykko Xoossa kiyateth nena maarotethakko kaalethizayssa shaaka eronta dashe iza gita kiyatethanne iza dandaya duretetha ne leqqay?
Nu Xoossa sinth shiiqanas nuus diza xalatethi hayssa. Nu ay miishikka iza shene mala woossikko izi nu woossa siyana.
Inte izan ammaniza gish hidota Xoossi intenan ufaysinne saroteth kuntho. Hessika Xillo Ayana wolqa hidota intes daranassa.
Yesusi kaqqettidason issi atakiltesoy dees. He atakiltezason oonikka moogetonta ooratha duufoy dees.

Gido attin he do7azi oyketides. Kase izara daro malata ooththida wordo nabezikka izara oykettides. Izi qas he do7aza malatay ista bolla dizaytanne he do7aza misilezas goynnidaytanne gita malatata ooththi ooththidi ista baleththishe gam7ides. Heyti nam7ati diine geetettiza taman exxiza tama abban hayqqonta paxa dishe yegetida. *
Halo kessanappe “Neni ne morkey gafikko miza; izi saamotikko ushsha; ne hessatho ooththikko tama bonqo iza bolla koraasa” geetettidi Geeeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides. *
Kirstoosa qaalay intenan kumeth gido. Inte inte garsan aadho eratethan tamaritenne zoretite; mazamureninne saban Ayana yethan galatara gaththi inte woznara Xoossas yexite.
Azinato! Inte inte macheta siiqitenne istas menxe iitoppite. *
Ammaniza macassi oonikka baso asa giddon am7eti diza gidikko Woossa Keeththi tumu am7eta xalla maaddana mala izakka ba baggara ba am7eta maaddu attin Woossa Keeththas tooho gidana mala aaggagupu.
Iza markatethaykka Xoossi merna de7o nuus immides; he de7oyka iza naazan dees gizayssa. *
Naazi dizades de7oy dees; Xoossa nay bayndades de7oy baawa.
Histikko naazi intena wozikko inte wozetidayta gidana.
Hessa gish inte bonchettana mala tani inte gish ta bolla gakkida waayezan inte ufays qanxonta mala ta intena hadara gays.
Heytanta mala asati Yesus Kirstoosas ooththizayta gidonta ba qantha kaththa gish ooththizayta. Shugo qaalara haasayaninne wozna kiya asata baleththetes.
Ubba baggara makalanne iitateth, yiiqenne iita ooson xalala kumida; qanatetethan, shempo wodhon, ooshan, baleththoninne genen kumidayta qasseka zigirzayta gidida.
Nees imettida lo7o hadara nunan diza Xillo Ayanan naaga.
Ba asho amo kunthanas zerizadey ashoppe dhayssi maxana. Ayana ufayssanas zeridadey gidikko ayanappe merna de7o maxana.
Ista garsafe issi issi asati Goda paacidi shooshan duketti hayqqi dhayidayssa mala nuka ane Goda paacokko. *
bessontaz ooththenna, barka ba go7a xalala xeellenna. Qoho qoodan yeggenna.
Biratappe oosettida xurure geetettiza may7o mala tira bolla may7iza may7oy istas dees; ista qefey giiriza giirissay olas togetiza daro paranne para-gaareta giirissa mala giirees. *
Ta yaada istas yootontakko istas nagara gidenna. Ha7i qas ista nagaras hanno giza gaasoy baawa.
Ammanonta asatara intes diza hanotethan aadho eratethan Simeretite. Intes beettida lo7o qaadan go7ettite. *
Hayssafe guye nu nagaras aylle gidonta mala nagara asatethay kichchana mala kase nu ceega asatethay izara issife kaqettidayssa nu eroos.
Xoossa naytinne Xala7e nayti shaaketi eretezay hessanna. Xillo ooththontaynne ba isha siiqontay wuri Xoossafe gidenna.
Nagaras haarettiza woznay Xoossara oosha. Gaasoyka izi Xoossa wogas haarettennanne haarettanas dandayenna.
Hessa gish ta woznay ufayetees; ta duunaykka galatees; ta ashoy ufayssan daana.
Gidenna! Ammanonta asay shiishshiza yarshoy Xoossas gidonta Xala7esa. Intes Xala7era issifetethi daana mala ta koyikke. *

Anxokiyan diza Woosa Keeththan nabetinne astamareti deettes. Heytikka Barnabaassinne Negeere geetettiza Simoonara, Qareena dere as Luqiyoosara, Herdoosara issife dicida Minaheranne Sawulera wuri issife deettes. *
Intena oonikka wordo hasayon baleththofo. Gaasoyka Xoossa hanqoy izas azazettonta nayta bolla yaanay haytanta malanna.
Heytanta co7u histeth bessees. Gaasoyka isti besonta ogera baassi go7a demmanas bessonta timirte tamarson keeththa asa wursi mooron deettes.
Yesusi “Inte ubbatikka geesh deekketa” giday iza aaththi immanaddey oonakkonne eriza gishassa.
Yesusi, “Ta intes tumu gays; dorsata yire pengerappe attin hara baggara guppi gelizay kaysonne bonqizade.
Isti suure ogeza aggagidi dhayida. Iita ooso ooththidi demmiza miish siiqida Bi7oore naa Bala7ame oge biidi balettida.
He wode Ayhudatinne Ayzaabeti bana kaaleththizaytara issife gididi ista waayssanassinne shuchchan caddanas koyda.

Heedzdzantho “Yoona naa Simoona! Ne tana dosay?” gides. Izi heedzdzantho “Ne tana dosay?” gida gish Phexroosi michetidinne “Godo! Ne wursa eraasa ta nena dosizayssakka ne eraasa” gides; Yesusikka qasseka “Ta dorsata heemma.
Harassiza miishi mulekka gede izin gelenna. Tunateth ooththizaytinne wordo haasayizayti mulekka hee izikko geletenna. He izin gelanayta sunthi kase he dorsaza de7o maxaafan xaafetidayta xalala. *

He macasaya galal7o mala may7onne zo7o may7o may7adus; worqan, boncho shuchchaninne inqo geetettiza al7o miishi may7ada phoolawus; iza ba kushen qas iita shuunniza miishinne ba tuna laymatethi izan kumida worqa xu7a oykka uttadus. *
Hessa ubba bolla ubba kumeththa issifetethan shiishshi qachchiza siiqo may7ite.
Yesusikka istas “Hekko Asa Nay bonchettiza saatey gakkides.
Ne hara asay laymatonta mala yootashe nees laymatay? Nees eeqa ixasashin Xoossa Keeththa miisha bonqay?
Nagaray qasse wogappe kezida azazoy bessida ogen go7ettidi ta giddon dumma dumma iita amo dentheththides. Wogay yaanappe kase nagaray hayqqidaza.
Isra7eele asa kusheppenne ta nena istako kiittiza Ayzaabeta kusheppekka ashshana.
Nukka kase qofay bayndayta, azazettontayta, balettizayta, dumma dumma amoninne lo7o dussas aylletethan haarettizayta. Asaranne nurka nu garsanka oyeetishe iitatethaninne miqaynetethan doos.
Xoossaninne Yesus Kirstoosan doorettida kiitanchata sinthan hayta azazota oonakka maaddonta ne naagana malanne issi miishikka ta goorippe ziqqi dhoqu histonta mala ta nena hadara gays.
Hessa gish gita waagay diza kase inte ammanetetha aggofte.
Hadara ekidaytika ammanettidayta gidanas bessees.
Phexroosikka issi Simoona geetettiza galba qaacizadera Iyophphen daro wode de7ides.
Inte inte hu7es Xoossa Keeththe gididayssanne Xoossa Ayanay inte giddon dizayssa ereketii? *
Hessa gish ta ishato; nuni Yesus Kirstoosa suutha baggara gede ubbafe dumma geesh geetettizasoyo gelanas xalateth demmidos.
Yesusi qasseka “Ta baana shin inte tana koyananne inte inte nagarara hayqqana attin ta bizaso baana dandayekketa” gides.
Hessa gish dumma gididi dosettidayto, inte Xoossas doorettidayta gidida mala mishetethinne kiyateth, ashketeth, bonchonne dandaya may7ite. *
Taas ooththana koyizadey tana kaallo; Taas ooththizadey ta dizason daana; Taas ooththizade ta Aaway iza bonchana” gides.
Ba nayta azazettizaytanne as bonchizayta histi dichchidi ba keeththa asa wogara ayssizade gidanas bessees.
Hessa gish tumappe inte ha7i ooththizayssa malaka issoy issara minetitenne minthethite.
Inte koyro siyidara “Nu nu garsan siiqettana bessees” geetettida kiitaya hanno. *
Hayssa ha7i wode meto gaason inte ha7i diza mala dizaakko taas lo7o misatees.
Farsaaweeta bagga as gidida Ayhudata halaqatappe issi Niqodimoosa geetettiza asi dees.
Hessathoka layman diza Era7aaba kiiteti bida asata mokka ekada hara ogera moyiza yeddida gish ba ooson xillabeykkee?
Gidikkokka macassi ammanoninne siiqon geeshshatethan barka bana haaron minnikko naa yelon attana.
Ha Isra7eele dere Xoossay kase nu aawata doorides; isti Gibxe deren dishin ista dhoqu dhoqu histides. Ba wolqama qesera heeppe ista kessides. *
Asa wozna eriza Xoossi nuus immidayssa mala istaska Xillo Ayana immidi ista baas ekkidayssa markatides. *
“Laymatoppa” gidadey izikka zaaridi “Wodhopa” gides. Ne laymatonta agikkokka ne asa wodhikko wogappe aadhdhidade gidassa. *
Ta istas merna de7o immana; mulekka ista dhayetenna; ista ta kusheppe woththi ekkanas dandayanaddey oonikka deenna.
Sarotetha Goday Xala7e eeson inte toho gars aaththi dincereththana. Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethi intenara gido.
Ammaniza as misatana shin ammanos diza wolqa kadana. Heyta malatappe ne haakka.
hessathoka nuni darota gidi uttidi Kirstoosan issi asho; nuni issoy issas asho.
Hessika ammanettida qaala. Xoossa ammanizayti lo7o oosos bana aaththi immana mala hayssa wursa ne lo7etha yootana mala ta koyays. Hessika lo7onne ay assikka koyizaza.
“Abrahaamey Xoosse ammanides; he ammanoy izas xillotethan qoodetides” giza maxaafa qaalay poletides; izikka Xoossi dosiddadde geetettides. *
Ta ishato! Inte bonchettida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ammanizayta gidida mala ase bessonta ogera maaddofte.
Ista duunay doya diza duufo mala; ista duunay ubba wode baleththo haasayees; ista metershay shoosha marzera dees. *
Azinatikka hessatho ba macheta ba asho mala siiqanas bessees. Ba macho siiqizadey bana siiqees.
Histin nu ay giinoo? Ammanon beettida xilloteth demmanas Ayzaabey daaburonta demmides.
Ammano xuura, lo7o qofara naaganas bessees.

Ammaniza godati diza ammaniza ashkarati godati istas ishata gidida gish godatas bessiza boncho imetto. Harappeka ista ooson maaddetiza ammaniza godati istas dosettidayta gidida gish nekka haytanta mala yo7ota tamarsanassinne zoranas bessees.
Istafe issi issades ammanoy baynda aggikko Xoossa ammanoteth diggizee?
Gido attin wotadarata giddofe issadey toorara iza millen caddin heerakka suuthinne haaththi gukkides.
Ta intes immiza azazoy ta intena siiqida mala inteka inte giddon issoy issara siiqetanassa. *

Inte asateth iita ooso ooththiza miish ooththi nagaras haarisofte. Hessa mala ooththanappe hayqoppe gede de7on pinnida asata mala intena Xoossas haarisite. Inte asatetha xillotetha miisha mala Xoossas haarisite.
“Nuni gidikko ammanidi attidayta bagga attin gede guye undudi dhayizayta bagga gidokko” gides.
Hessa gish Isra7eele nayti wurikka attana. “Ashshizaddey Xiyooneppe yaana; Yaqoobeppeka iitateth diggana. *
Isti Goda Yesusanne kase nabetaka wodhida; nunakka goodida; Xoossaka ufaysibetenna; asa ubbara eqetizayta gidida. *
Nuni tuma shaakki eridi ekkidayssafe guye erishe nagara ooththikko hayssafe guye nagaras shiiqanas hara yarshoy deenna.
Xoossi nuna Kirstoosara gaththi denthides. Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuna salon banara uttissides.
Nu wurikka issi asho gidida gish wordoteth diggidi nuni nu garsan issoy issara ane tuma hasayos. *
Hayta he asatas nuni issitokka haarettibeekko. Hessika inte Mishiraachcho qaala tumatethan eqi daana mala giidikko.
Hessa gish hara qaalan haasayiza asi ba haasayidayssa birsheththi erana mala baasi woosso.
Sawuley Goda ammaniza asa wodhanas ceeqqettishe Qeeseta halaqakko bides.
Ta qasse ha7i neekko bays; ta ha alameza bolla dashe hayssa yootizay ta ufayssi istan polettana mala gaada yootays.
Hessafe bollara Kirstoosa bonchoy qonciza wode inte keehi ufayettana mala inte izara iza waayeza ekkizayta gidida mala ufayetite.
Ta tishshi hista xeellishin oyddu tohora diza meheta, wora do7ata, biitta bolla gooshettiza medhetethatanne salo bolla piradhiza kafota beyadis.
Ha7i gidikko hanqo, yiillo, cashshe, zigirsinne yeellasiza haasaya heytanta misatizayta wursi diggite.
Izikka istaththo dunkane sikkizade gidida gish ista achchan uttidi dunkane sikkon gelides.
Hessa gish iita ooththana koyiza iita asho qofa koydi hayqqida inte asatetha bolla nagaray kawotana mala ooththofte.
Heyta mala asati ba ooso co7u gi ooththana malanne ba kath maana mala Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan nu ista azazoossinne zoroos.
“He qommota aawati Yoosefe bolla qanatidi iza aylletethas duge Gibxe bayzida. Gido attin Xoossi izara dees; *

Ista giddofe issoy Agaboossa geetettizayssi dendi eqqidi Xillo Ayanay iza bessin alame ubban gita koshay dendanayssa yootides. Hessika Oroome kawo Qalawodosa Qeesare geetettizayssa kawoteththa wode poletides. *
Hessafe guye Phawuloosi ubba asara gulbatidi woossides.
Yesus Kirstoosas gididayti asho iza iita qofaranne iza iita amotethara issife kaqqida.
Ta ishato! Inte bolla dumma dumma waayey gakkikko hessa wursi ufayssan qoodite.
“Nu dhuman simeretishe izara nuus issifetethi dees” giikko wordotos attin tuman dookko.
Nuni Pharteena asay, Meede asay, Eelaame asay, Mesopotoomiyan, Yuhudan, Qophodooqiyan, Phanxoosan, Iisiyan,
Hessathoka Godas bessiza duus daana mala inte iza poli ufayssana mala lo7o ooso ubban ayfe immana malanne Xoosse eron dicci dicci baana mala nu intes woossos.
Ta naa Ximtoosa ne gish kasetidi yootetida mala hayssa azazoza ta nees immadis. Hessika ne he qaala kaallashe lo7o baaxe baaxetanassa.
Hessafe guye daro asa qaala giiris misatiza gita qaala giiris saloppe “Hale luuya! Atotethi, bonchoy, wolqaykka nu Godassa. *
Inte inte qohida qoho gishshinne inte nagara gaason hayqqideyta shin,
Xala7e ushshinne Goda ushshi inte issife gaththi uyana dandayekketa. Goda maaddafenne Xala7e maaddafe gaththi maana dandayekketa.
Laymay woykko tunatethi woykko uuzetethi mulekka inte giddon betoy attin zigirsikka siyetofo. Hessa malay geeshsha Xoossa asas bessenna.
Geeshshatas miishi wurikka geeshsha shin tunatasinne ammoontaytas gidikko wurikka tuna. Harappeka ista qofay wurikka tunides.
Siyida asay wuri “Hayssi Yerusalamen ha suntha xeygizayta dhayissiza addeza gidenee? Qasse izi ha yiday he asata qachi ekki Qeeseta Halaqatakko efanas deenee?” gishe malaletida.
Gido attin Yesusi giddo geli gaannatizay caaqo qaalay kaseyssafe aadhdhizayssa mala izi ekkida oosoykka kaseyta oosoppe aadhdhees. Hessika kaseyssafe lo7iza hidota qaalanna.
Taas duus guussi Kirstoosa. Hayqoyka taas go7a.
Intenan lo7o ooso doommidayssi izi Yesus Kirstoosi wursetha pirdas yaana gakkanaas intena dandayissanayssa ta ammanays.
Xoossa nay yidayssa tumu gidida iza nu erana mala akeeka izi nuus immidayssa nu eroos. Nuka tumu gidida iza naaza Yesus Kirstoosan doos; Izikka tumu Xoossan merna de7o.
Intes dandayettikko inte inte baggara asa ubbara saron diite.
Nuus hidota qaala immidadey ammanettizade gidida gish nuni ammanidi iza gish markattiza hidotappe hee haa goonta ane lo7ethi oykkos.
“Ta intes saroteth gido aggada bays; ta sarotethikka ta intes immana; ta intes immiza sarotethi alamey immiza sarotetha mala deenna. Inte woznay hirgofonne babbofo.
Nuni ashon diza wode Godappe haakki dizayssa erikkoka izan ammanettidi doos.
Ta qaala siydi ooththontade bolla pirdanay tana gidikke. Gaasoyka ta yiday alame ashshanas attin alame bolla pirdanas gidenna.
Iita bagga gididi ba isha wodhida Qayeele mala gidoppite. Izi aazas wodhidee? Gaasoykka iza oosoy iita; isha oosoy lo7o gidida gishassa. *
Abba giddon diza dereti wurikka baqatida; zumatikka beettibeetenna. *
Hessa gish hayssa hayqqida asa mala qoodetida issi Abrahaameppe salo xoolinte malanne abba ace mala qooday baynda daro zerethay beettides. *
Hessa gish mernas hayqqi eronta, ayfen beetti eronta barka xalla Xoosse gidida kawos mernappe merna gakkanaas izas bonchoynne galatay gido. Amiin.
Izikka ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Xoossas babbitenne iza bonchite. Iza pirda wodey gakkides. Salonne biitta, abbanne haaththa, pultokka medhdhida Xoossas goynnite” gides.
Ammanizayta qooday dari dari biza wode Girike biittafe yida Ayhuda asati Yuhudan diza Ayhuda asa guyera zigirettida. Gaasoyka ubba wode miza kath gishishe am7eta wudetonta aggida gishassa.
Inte xeeygetidaykka hessassa. Inte iza leemiso kaallana mala Kirstoosi inte gish waaye ekkidi intes leemiso gidides.
Nu intenara diza wode “Ooso ooththanas dosonta asi kath mooppo” giza azazo intes immidos.
Xoossa Naa ammanizay wuri merna de7o demmanappe attin dhayonta mala Xoossi hayssa alameza daro siiqida gish ba mexi issi naaza immides.
Tuna ayanaykka “Ta Yesusakka erays; Phawuloosakka erays shin inte qas oonantee?” gides.
Hessathoka do7azinne biitta kawoti ista ola asikka booththa Para togidayssaranne iza ola asara olettanaas shiiqidayta beyadis.
Iisiya abba achchan diza dereta biza markaben gelidi bidos. Tasolonqen diza issi Maqidooniya as Arisxirokoosa geetettizayssi nunara dees.
Qasho keeththan dizaytara inteka qashettida mala istas qoppite. Hessathoka asa kushen waayetizaytara inteka waayetiza mala istas qoppite.
Iza baggara Xoossa Aawas galata shiishshishe qaalan gidin woykko ooson inte ooththizayssa wursi Goda Yesusa sunthan ooththite.
Qaala tamarizay oonikka ba tamarida lo7o miisha ba astamarezara gishetto.
Haray attoshin issi tohoy eqqiza gadey izas hayssafe immetibenna. Gido attin he wode izas issi naykka baynda dishin izinne izappe guyen iza zerethi Biittayo laattana mala Xoossi izas caqqides. *
Izikka nu asa ba gene ooson metothides. Buro yelettida guutha nayti hayqqana malanne yelida nayta kare kessi wora yeggana mala wolqathides. *
Heerakka Phexroosinne Yesusa kaalliza hinko issoy kezidi gede duufoy dizaso bida.
Hessa gish Xoossa sinthaninne asa sinthan sidhey baynda hanoy taas daana mala ubba wode minnays.
Isti yeellachiza ba oosoza wolqama abba dambala mala gopponto copu histizayta. Gird gida dhumay ista mernas naagizayssanne coo mela waayetiza xoolinteta malakko!
Hayssa ha Mishiraachcho qaalaza Yesus Kirstoosi taas qoncisides attin ta oonappekka ekkabeekke; woykko oonikka tana tamarsibenna.
Nagarancha medhetetha shenen nu diza wode hayqos gathiza ayfe nu ayfana mala wogay dentheththida nagara amoy nu bolla ooththides.
Takka hayssas mishiraachcho yootanas kiitettidade. Qasseka deretas tumu ammano astamare gidada shuumetadis. Hessaka ta wordotonta tumu yootanassa. *
Iza azazota naagizayti wuri izan deettes; izikka istan dees. Izi nunan dizayssa nu izi nuus immida Ayanan eroos.
Asi wurikka ba lagge go7anaz gaaththi xeello attin bana go7anaz xalala koyoppo.
Inte inte garsan doseteththan diite. Manqotara issifetethan daanas koyite attin otoretofitenne ceeqqettofte. *
Camo yo7o wursi hanqokka, yiillo, oosh, cashshe, qasseka hanko hara iitateth wursi intefe diggite.
Xoossa qaala ta intes pacey baynda gaththana mala taas Xoossafe imettida hadara mala ta Woossa Keeththa oosancha gidadis.
Iza hu7eynne iza hu7e binanay qas booththa shach misatiza booththa suufe geetettiza katha mala. Iza ayfetikka tama laco misatetes. *
Daro asa gakkishe diza kiyatethi Xoossa bonchos galata bolla galata gujjana mala hayssi wurikka intena go7anas hanides.
Ta asho mizaynne ta suuth uyizay wuri tanan daana. Takka izaaden daana.
Izakka zaarada “Ee Godo! Neni duge ha alameza kiitettida Xoossa Naa gididayssa ta ammanays” gadus.
Istika Hawaareta timirten, issife quma muussaninne woossan minnida.
Neni xilloteth dosadassa; makalaka ixxaasa; hessa gish Xoossi ne Goday nena ne laggetappe bolla kessides. Nena ufayssa zayte tiyides” gees.
Yohannisa isha Yaqoobe mashshan wodhisides.
Coo mela duuna lalabeteththafe haakka. Hessa mala yo7on waaxetida asati Xoossafe haakki haakki bettes.
Ba isha ixizadey shempo wodhida asa. Shempo wodhidades merna de7oy bayndayssa inte ereeta.
Isti mi giigishin Yesusi Simoona Phexroosa “Yoona naa Simoona! Haytantafe ne tana aaththa tana dosay?” gides. Izikka “Ee ta Godo! Ta nena dosizayssa nekka eraasa” gides.
Issades hiillan haasayana eratethi imetees. Hara asas qas he Ayananka eratetha qaalan haasayana qaalay imetees.
Isti nam7antho biza wode Yoosefey izi oonakkonne bana ba ishatas qoncisides. Paarooneykka Yoosefe ishata erides. *
Geeshsha Maxaafay giza mala “De7on daana koyizaynne lo7o gallassata beyanas koyiza asi ba duunappe iita haasayonta malanne ba metershatikka gene haasayonta mala naageto.
Ammanizayti wurikka issi woznaninne issi qofan gaaggi deettes. Istas dizay wuri issi bolla dees attin baas dizaz “Hayssi taas buzo miisha” gizaddey deenna. *
Tani taas ekkidayssanne ubbafe aadhdhizayssa intes aaththa immadis. Geeshsha Maxaafati gizayssa mala Kirstoosi nu nagara gish hayqqides. *
“Izi giddon nabeta sunthi, geeshshata sunthinne biitta bolla asa kushen hayqqidayta ubbata sunthi beettides” gishe duge abba giddo yeggides. *
Ayzaabeti hessa siydi daro ufayetida. Goda qaalasikka boncho immida. Merna de7os giigettida derey wuri ammanides.
Haytanta ta markattizayssi “Tani addafe eeson yaana!” gees. Amiin! Goda Yesusa haaya.
Inte taappe tamaridayssa woykko inte taappe ekkidayssanne siyidayssa woykko beydayssa ay gidikkokka wursi ooththite. Goday intenara gidana.
Gido attin iza inte isha mala hanqite attin morke mala xeellofte.
Kirstoosan xaphidaz gidonta asa woganinne go7ay baynda ha alameza laafa wogan eqqida asa eratethaninne coo mela baleththo haasayan intena oonikka di7onta mala naagetite.
Xoossi tana Yesus Kirstoosa baggara pude xeygida gish woyto gakka ekkanas elelays.
Izikka nuna iitatethafe wozanasinne lo7o ooththanas minniza ba dere erays dooranas bana nuus aaththi immides. *
“Ta intes tuma gays, ta qaala siyizadessinne tana kiittidaden ammanizades merna de7oy dees. Izaadey hayqoppe gede de7on pinnides attin iza bolla pirdetenna.
Hessa taas yootida kiitanchazas he katamayonne izi pengeta qasseka he ginbe lashaza izara wadhiza worqa zangey dees. *
Ista wurseth dhayo. Ista uloy ista Xoossa. Istas kawushshatethay istas boncho. Ista woznay shempiday ha biitta duussanna.
Otoretethan puurdi Xala7ey kundida pirdan izi kundonta mala oorath ammanizade gidoppo.

Ta siiqoto! Nu issife attida atotetha gish ta intes xaafanas daro koyadisishin ha7i qasse nam7anthonta issito Xoossi asas immida ammano gish inte daro baaxettana mala ta intena zorays. Ta intes xaafanas taas tooho gidides.
Yiidinne Hawaareti asa tamarsizayssassinne Yesusa baggara bettida hayqqidayta dentha gish sabakizayssas keehi hanqettida.
Izi nagaray doorettidi pude salo gakkides. Xoossika izi mooroza akeekides. *
Hessafe guye Yesusi haaththe woyne cajje ooththida Galila dere giddon diza Qaana geetettiza katama nam7antho bides. He wode Qifirnahoomen izas nay saketida issi kawo shuumey dees. *
Godas ooththana Ayanan xuugetizayta gidite attin hessa he minotethafe guye gooppite.
Inte Yesus Kirstoosa ayfera beyonta aggikkokka inte iza dooseeta; ha7ikka inte iza beyonta aggikkokka iza ammaneta; coo qaalan qoncisana dandayonta gita boncho ufays inte ufayeteta.
Izi nuus ba Ayana immida gish nu izan dizayssanne izikka nunan dizayssa nu hessan eroos.

Heen gadaan caala phanqida ushshi kumi uttida issi xaaro malay dees. Hessa gish heen gadaan dizayti he caala ushsha zandza misatiza safnage geetettizayssara hisophe geetettiza mitha xeeran qaaphidi iza duunakko shiishida.
Izi nuna dhuman haareteththafe ashshidi gede ba dosiza naaza kawoteththan nuna pinthides.
Ta ishato! Asa garsan shaaketethi medhizaytappenne inte tamarida timirta ekkonta ixon intes dhuphe gidiza asatappe inte naagetite.
Ooththi maaddizadey ooththi maaddo; tamarsizadeykka tamarso.
“Inte he wode taappe aykkoka woosseketa; Ta intes tumu gays; ta sunthan ta aawa woossikko izi intes wursikka immana.
He katamayssi gido masarate shuchchay dumma dumma al7o shuchchan lo7i giigides. Koyro masaratezi Iyasiphide, nam7anthozi Simpere, heedzdzanthozi Kelqedoone, oydanthozi Margide,
Hessa gish lo7o gidizayssa ooththanas bessizaysa erishe ooththontades nagara gidana.
Hessafe guye “Izas yayyiza iza oosanchati wurikka guuthatinne gitati nu Goda galattite” giza qaalay algafe kezides. *
He wodey gakkanaas nu keeththa saloyssa may7anas nu laamoti naagos.
Issi issi asi ba ooso barka paaci xeello. Hessafe guye hara asara bana ginasonta dishe izi bana ceeqqisizazi demmana.
Issadey ba oychida gela7oyo wogara oykkonta aggikko izi wodeykka cimmi cimmi biikko ekkana koykko ba koyda mala ekko. Ekikkone gelikko lo7o. Nagara gidenna.
Isti intena ba keeththafe gooddana; haray attoshin intena wodhizadey wuri Xoossas ooththizade misatiza wodey yaana.
Tani hara wolqama malata salo bolla beyadis. Xoossa hanqoy istan poletanaas wurseth gidida laapun boshata oykkida laapun kiitanchata beyadis.
Yesusikka zaaridi “Ta iita haasayida gidikko ane ta gooyssa ne markata; Ta yootiday likke gidikko tana aazas baqqay?” gides.

Ero! Neno! Tanara issife ammanettida oosanchazo, Mishiraachcho qaala yootos tanaranne Qalamenxoosara qasseka ista sunthay de7o maxaafen xaafetida hanko tanara ooso laggetara issife waayidayta he macasata ne maaddana mala ta nena woossays.
Asay kase ammanizayta suuthinne nabeta suuth gussida gish ne ista suuth ushshadasa. Hessika istas bessees”
Mulekka gidenna. Nuni nagaras hayqqidos. Histin hayssafe guye nu waani nagaran daanee?
Ospuntho kawozi kase dizadde shin ha7i qas baynda do7akko. Izi laapunatappe issaa. Izikka gede dhayoso baana.
Gido attin Geeshsha Maxaafay qasse ay gizee? “Aylleyo izi naazara digga; aylle nay goqay naara lattenna” gees.*
Dure gidanas koyizayti gidikko gede paaceninne narxan gelidi oyketizayssa mala daro hadaninne iita amon un7etetes.
He do7azinne ne beyida tammu kaceti he layma macasayo ixeettes. Isti izo dhayoso gaththana; kallo mela ashshana; isti izi asho maananne izo tamanka xuugana.
Xoosse siiqizadey gidikko izi Xoossa achchan eretidade.
Histin nu ay giinoo? Nuni istafe aadhdhizonii? Mulekka aadhdhokko. Ayhudata gidikkoka Ayzaabeta gidikkoka wurikka nagarappe garsa baggara diza gish ta wursaka kasetada istas yootadis.
He wode mara misile medhidi eeqas yarsho shiishida. Barka medhdhida ba kushe ooson ufayetidi guppida. *

Hayta ha bochatan hayqoppe attida asa zerethati kase ba ooththida iita oosoppe simmidi maarotethan gelibeyttenna. Daydanthas worqafe, birappe, xarqimalappe, shuchchafe, mithafe, oosettida xeellanas woykko haythan siyanaas woykko hammuttanas dandayonta eeqatas goynno aggibeyttenna. *

Hessa gish Godas babo guussi ay guussakkonne nu eriza gish asay nu yootizayssa ero gi ekkana mala ooththanas daaburoos. Nuni oonantakkonne Xoossa achchan qonce. Qasseka inte woznanka qonce gididayssa ta ammanays.
Hayssafe kase nuni nu asho amoteth polishe ashoy koyiza oge kaallishe istara doos. Nunikka hanko asa mala nu medhetethafe Xoossa hanqo giddon de7oos.
Hara daro qaalara istas markatishe “Hayssa geella yeletethafe intena ashshite” giidi ista qofisides.
Asho shene mala diza gidikko inte hayqqana; asho ooso iitaza inte Ayanan wodhikko inte de7on daana.
Geeshsha Maxaafay giza mala “Izan ammanizay wurikka yeellatenna.” *
Inte ammanoy alame kumeththan siyetida gishshinne inte gish ta Goda Xoossa Yesus Kirstoosa baggara galatays.
Xoossan dosettida nu ishato! Izi intena dooridayssa nu eroos.
Siiqoy daro nagara kammiza gish harappe bollara inte inte garsan lo7ethi siiqetite. *
Nuni Xaalane dere markaben baana mala geetetti qashettida gish Phawuloosanne hara qasho asataka kawo Awugisxoosa wotadaratappe gidida Yuuliyoosa geetettiza mato halaqas aaththi immida.
Xoossa oosancha Muse yethinne dorsaza yeth, “Ubba dandayiza Goda Xoosso! Ne oosoy gitanne malalisizaza; dere kawozo! Ne ogey likkenne tuma. **
Ha7i yeletida guutha nayti maath amottizayssa mala inteka attanas, izan dicci dicci baanas geeshi gidida Ayana timirte laamotite.
Tani saloppe hizgiza qaala siyadis “Hayssafe guye Goda Yesusayta gididi hayqqanayti isti anjettidayta.” Xillo Ayanaykka “Ee, isti ba dabursafe shempana mala ista oosoy ista kaallana” gees.
Xoossa Aawa sinthan iitatethi baynda lo7o ammanoy; Aayanne aaway hayqqida nayta, ista azinati hayqqida macasata metotetishin maadonne hayssa alameza tunatethafe bana naago.
Oonikka intena duuna mal7eththon baleththonta mala ta intes yootays.

Salonka sa7a bollaka, biittafe garsanka, abba giddon diza medhetetha ubban “Alga bolla uttidayssassinne dorsaas galataynne dhoqatethi, bonchoynne wolqay mernappe merna gakkanaas izas gido!” gishin ta siyadis.
Nam7antho kiitanchaykka ba zayeza punnides; issi gita zuma misatiza miishi eexxishe duge abba giddo yegetides; Abbas cigoy suuth gidides.
Istifanoose oykkidi katamappe gede kare olida. Shuchchan cach oykkida. Hessi wuri hanishin markatikka ba may7o Sawule geetettiza paantha achchan woththida.
Nam7anthokka “Ayzaabeti inte wurikka Goda galattite; derey wuri iza sabbite” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides. *
Wurikka izappe, izan, izassa; izas bonchoy mernappe mernas gido! Amiin. *
Wontetha gallas Yohannisi Yesusi baako yishin beyidi “Dere nagara biittafe diggana Xoossa dorsi hekko hayssich!
Layman aqiza Era7aaba dere xomoosana yidayta saron mokka ekkida gish hanko azazettonta asara dhayonta ammanon attadus. *
Kaysoy kaysotana, wodhanassinne dhayssanas xalla yees. Ta gidikko intes de7oy daana malanne intes keehi darana mala yadis.
Nu derey gidikko salona. Heeppe buro yaanayssa nuna ashshida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa yuussa laamotethan naagon doos.
Hessa gish Xoossi intena Xoossa bonchon mokki ekkida mala inteka issoy issa ufayssan mokki ekkite.

Ne ista nenara ekkada istara gidada nena geeshsha; asati ba hu7e meedettana malanne Xoossa Keeththan imettiza muxuwata miisha ne istas qanxa; ne hessatho ooththikko ne bolla woretidayssi wuri mela gididayssanne nekka Muse woga pola naagizade gididayssa asay wuri erana.
Izi qaxxaretidaytaska aawa; qaxxaretidaytas xalala gidonta nu aawa Abrahaamey kase qaxxaretanappe sinthe izas diza ammano geedo kaallizaytas ubbassa.
Hessafe saama yeggin saamay Maatiyaasas kezides. Izikka tammanne issi Hawaaretara issife tayibettides.
“Istas ista bala oosoy atto geetettidaytinne nagarappe maaretidayti anjettidayta!
Heyti biitta Goda sinthan eqqiza nam7u wogara mithatinne ista bolla xompe woththiza nam7u ballata. *
Darsi qoppite; muuzotite; yeekkite; inte miichay yeehon; ufayssay qasse muuzotethan simmo.
Ta ishazo! Lo7ota misata attin iita asata misatoppa. Lo7o ooththizadey wurikka Xoossa asa. Iita ooththizadey qasse Xoosse beybenna.
Izi kase qaxxaretanappe kase demmida xillotethay qaxxaras malata gidana mala xillotethas maatame ekides. Hessa gish qaxxaretonta ammanizaytas xilloteth qoodettanna mala ubbatas izi aawa. *
Gaasoyka hayqqida asi nagarappe shempides.
Yesusa de7oy nu asatethan qoncana mala nuni iza hayqo ubba wode tookki yuuyoos.
Haray wurikka Yesus Kirstoosayssa gidonta ba go7as woxxizade xalala.
Abrahaames wodey gede biddade gidikkokka Saaraykka yelonta makara gidikkokka hidota istas immidadey ammanettidade histi xeelidi ammanon naa aawa gidanas gakkides. *
Tana kiittidayssa sheney taas immidaytappe issadeka dhayssonta wursetha gallas ta denthana.

Ha7i qasse Ximtoossi inte achchafe nuukko yiidi inte ammano gishshinne inte siiqotetha gish lo7o wore nuna sisides. Qasseka inte ubba wode nuna lo7ethi qoppizayssanne nukka intena beyanas laamotiza mala inteka nuna beyanas laamotizayssa nuus yootides. *
Inte hessatho ooththikko hanko waanna heemmizayssi qonciza wode inte mooretonta boncho aklile ekkana.
Hessa gish hessa mala hidotay nuus diza gish nuni xalatethan hasayos.

Heyti wordo astamareti qas baas erettonta ixida miish wursi cashshi cayeettes. Heytanti narxan oyketanassinne hayqqanas yeletida. Coo mela ba shenen dizaytanne qofay baynda do7ata mala. Do7ati coo mela dhayizayssatho istika mulera dhayana.
Izi hessa giday miisha shiishshiza karaxite oykkizadey iza gidida gish shiiqiza miishafe baas shiishshidi go7ettizade gidida gishassa attin manqotas mishetidi gidenna.
Hessa gish Xoossi nuna siiqiza siiqo nu eroos. Nu iza siiqon ammanettos. Xoossi siiqo. Siiqon dizadey Xoossan dees. Xoossika hessaden dees.
Istifanoose bolla dendida goodeteththa gaason laalettida ammaniza asay qaala Ayhudatas xalala yootishe Pinqe, Qophiroosenne Anxokiya geetettizaso gakkanaas kanthi bida. *
Gido attin Tumu Ayana as gideth nuus dizayssan woppu giidi duussara gita wodhe.
Izi geeshshata olana malanne xoonana mala izas godateththi imettides. Dumma dumma qommotanne zarketa, dumma dumma qaalan haasayiza dereta ubba bolla izas godatethi imettides. *
Inte iita ooththida gish qaxayetishe dandayikko intes aaza galatay daanee? Inte lo7o ooththidi waaye ekkishe dandayikko inte Xoossafe galata ekkandeta.

Hessa gish xeeygetidayti istas immana geetettida merna laata ekkana mala Kirstoosi ooratha caaqos gaannatizadde gidides. Koyro caaqoza garsan diza wode isti ooththida nagarappe geeyana mala ista gish izi hayqqides.
Histin nu ay giinoo? Xoossa kiyatethi darana mala nagara gujji ooththinoo?
Inte galata galatizayta gidite attin ase yellachiza laafa haasayay coo eeyateththa yo7oy intes besontaa gish hessa malay inte garsan dooppo.

Qasseka Cololo para beyadis. Para togidayssa sunthi hayqo geetettes. Iza qas duufoy kaallees. Hayqoynne Duufoy biittafe sayso olan, gafan, boshaninne bazzo do7an wodhana mala godateththi istas imettides. *

Hessa gish hidotay ammanon yides. Hessika iza hidotay iza kiyatethan gidana malanne Abrahaame zerethas ubbas ammanettizayssa gidana mala hanides. Hessika wogan izayta gididaytas xalala gidonta ammanon Abrahaame nayta gididaytas ubbatassa. Izikka nuus ubbaska aawa. *
Oroome asati tana qori oychidappe guye tana hayqos gaththiza miish demmoonta aggida gish birshi yeddana koyda.
Hessa gish asi koyda mala gidonta woykko asa daburan gidonta Xoossi maarida mala hanees.
Ista garsafe issi issi asati laymatidi issi gallas nam7u tammanne heedzdzu shi asay dippi gi wuroyssatho wuronta mala nuka ane laymatokko. *
Gido attin ta asatetha giddon ooththiza nagara wogay tana qachi oykidi ta qofa wogara olettiza hara wogay ta asatetha giddon ooththishin beyays.
Hessa gish koyroppe Kirstoosa gish imettida timirteza aggidi ane gede mino timirteko boos. Hayqqida oosoppe maarotethan gelo gishshinne Xoossan ammano gish buro ane izan wodhdhi maadhoko.
Hessa gish oonikka iza kadhoppo. Izi taakko saron simmana mala inte maaddite. Nukka hara ammanizaytara iza yuussa naagon doos.
Ta ishato! Issi asi taas ammanoy dees giikko qasse ooson bessontade gidikko iza ay maaddanee? Hessa mala ammanoy iza ashshanee?
Yerusalame asappe issi issi asati “Isti wodhana koyiza addezi hayssa gidenee?
Hessa gi simmidi ista bolla ufu giidi “Inte Xillo Ayana ekkite.
Xoossi as xillisiza oge eronta aggidi ba xillotethas oge kaallida attin Xoossa xillotetha oge kaallibettenna.
Xoossa naan ammanizade ubba woznan iza gish markay dees. Xoosse ammanontay wurikka Xoossi ba naaza gish immida markatetha ammanonta gish iza wordoses.
Ta intes tumu gays; tana ammanizadey ta ooththiza ooso ooththana; hessafeka aaththi ooththana; gaasoyka tani Aawakko baana.
Aylleti aazanka ba godatas haarettana malanne ufayssana mala; qasseka awute zaaronta mala tamarsa.
Intefe issadeska Xoossa kiyatethi pacconta mala qasseka camo ayfe ayfiza mithi mokkidi meto medhonta malanne darota mooronta mala naagetite. *
Qasseka iza sunthan boretonta malanne Xala7e narxan izi gelonta mala ammanonta asa achchan lo7o markateth daanas koshshees.
Gidikkokka Kirstoosi immana gi qachida mala nuus issas issas dumma dumma imotethi imettides.
Nam7antho kiitanchazi qas xu7aza abba bolla gussides. Abbayka hayqqida asaa suutha mala gidides. Abba giddon shempora dizayti wurikka hayqqida.
Coo asa ayfen bettana malanne ooththisizaytappe duna anjo ekanas gidonta inte Kirstoosa aylleeta mala Xoossa shene kumeththa woznappe polana mala woznappe azazetite.
Inte istas immana zaaroy qas ashketethaninne bonchon gido. Inte Kirstoosayta gidida gish intes diza lo7o amaleza gish iita haasayiza asay ba iita haasayan yeellatana mala intes lo7o qofay de7o.
Ee ta sheney naaza beyidi iza ammanizadey wuri merna de7o demmanassa. Tanikka wurseththa gallas iza hayqoppe denthana” gides.
Herdoosikka Xoossas boncho immoonta aggida gish Goda kiitanchay heerakka Herdoosa shoci yeggin guxuni hayqqides.
Maariza Aawasinne wursikka minthethiza nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aawa Xoossas galatay gido.
Issi issi asay haytappe pooqi eqqidi go7ay baynda yo7otakko simmides.
Ammanzayti wuri attana mala Xoossa wolqa gidida gish ta mishiraachcho qaalan yeelatikke; hessikka koyro Ayhudatas kaallidi Ayzaabetassa. *
Gaasoyka keeththay keexeteth oyketidappe guye hara woththi qasse keexana dandayizadey oonikka baawa; hessikka keeththas koyroy Yesus Kirstoosa.
Gidikkokka intefe issi issadey ba macho bana siiqiza mala siiqo; machakka ba azina bonchu.
Inte kase inte mooroninne inte asho nagara hanotetha intefe diggonta aggida gish hayqqidaytakko shin Xoossi intena Kirstoosa baggara pathides; inte nagarakka ubba atto gides. *
Cimati ne bolla ba kushe woththi woossishin, nees imettida tinbite imotetha lepi hista aggofa.
Hessafe guye tani ooratha salonne ooratha sa7a beyadis. Kase saloynne kase biittay aadhdhi bida. Hayssafe guye abbayka deenna. *
Ubba wode ufayetite.
He gallasatan asay hayqqana koyana shin hayqo demmenna. Hayqqanas amottana shin hayqoy istafe baqatana. *
Yesusi hayqqidi dendidayssa nu ammaniza gidikko Yesusa ammanidayta Xoossi Yesusara hessathoka zaari ha yeddana.
Yesusi Xoossa naa gididayssa ammanidi markattiza ubban Xoossi deessinne, izaadeyka Xoossan dees.
Inte kase diza dussay baleththiza amon qitattida gish kase ceega asateth intefe qari yeggana mala tamarideta. *
Pengey tana. Ta baggara gelizadey wuri attana; gelananne kezana; heemmetizasoka demmana.
Shuchchan cadettida; magazenka nam7u kezi phaliqettida; mashshan shuketi hayqqida; waayetishe, goodetishenne daaburshe dorsa itenne deysha ite may7idi waayetida. *
Izi xillo gididayssa inte eriza gidikko xillo ooththizay wuri izappe yeletidayssa inte ereeta.

Gido attin geemara haniza yeelasiza yo7ota nu aggidos. As baleththokko; Xoossa qaala wordora walakkokko. Hessa histanappe tumu yo7ota qoncera yootishe asi wurikka nu gizayssa ekkana mala nunatetha Xoossa sinth shiishoos.
Hessa gish izi Xoossa ushachchan dhoqu dhoqu gidappe guye Xillo Ayana ufaysa ba aawappe ekkidi ha7i inte beyizayssanne siyizayssa duge gussides.
Bana medhdhidayssa misatana mala eran ooraxida ooratha asateth may7ideta. *
Yesusi hessa siydi “Ha sakoy Xoossa nay izan bonchettana malanne Xoossi bonchettanassafe attin iza hayqos gaththizaz deenna” gides.
“Xilloy Xoossa ammanon dees” geetettidi kase xaafettida mala Xoossa xilloteth mishiraachcho qaalan qoncinna; he xillotethi koyroppe wurseth gakkanaas ammanon hanana. *
Hessafe guye Yesusi ba kaqqettana masqaleza tookkidi “Asa hu7e guuge” geetettizaso kezides. Hesoy Ayhudata qaalara “Golgota” geettettes.
Nuus imettida imota mala dumma dumma imotethi dees. Issades buroppe hananaz yooto gidikko izaades imettida ammano mala yooto.
Koyro do7azi gaammo misatees. Nam7anthozi qas boora misatees. Heedzdzanthoza ayfesoy asa ayfeso misatees. Oydanthozi qas piradhiza golle kafo misatees.
Hessa gish eratethi bayndayta mala gidonta inte waanidi erata mala daanakkonne naagetite.
Ayhudata giddoninne Ayzaabeta giddon dummateththi deenna; issi Goday ubbaska Goda; iza woossizayta gujji anjees.
Ammaniza asa ubba xillisanas Kirstoosi woga ubba polides.
Haniza yo7on ubban galatan, woossaninne gaannateththan Xoossa sinthi shiiqite attin ay miishanka hirgofte.
Isti iita miish amottidayssatho nuka amottonta mala he ista hanoy nu naagettana mala nuus leemiso gidides. *
Izikka he ciimma ollaza doyides. He ciimma ollappe wolqama tama cuwa mala cuway kezides. He ollafe kezida cuwaza geedon awa arsheynne saloy dhumides. *
Hessa malan oonikka balettidi ba isha baleththofo; gaasoyka hayssafe kase nu intes yootida malanne naagetanas akeekissida mala Goday heytanta mala nagara ooththiza ubbata bolla ba hanqo ehana.
Hessa gish oonikka Kirstoosa bagga gidikko izi ooratha medhetetha. Kase ceega medhetethay aadhdhides. He iza kichchosan hara ooratha medhetethi gelides.
Gaasoyka Aaway naaza dossees. Ba ooththizayssakka wursi iza bessees; inte malalettana mala hayssafeka aadhdhiza ooso buro bessana.
Kase kaysotizadey hayssafe guye kaysotoppa. Gido attin metotetidi iza woossizaytas immiza miish iza kushen daana mala lo7o miish ba kushera ooththi demmanas daaburo.
Xoossi inte woossa siydi ta inteko baana mala taas hidotay diza gish ta baada intekon shempanaso taas hayana giigissa.
Dumma dumma imatha timirte ekkofte; nu woznay minni eqqizay Xoossa kiyatethan attin kaththa woga naagon gidenna. Hessa he woga naagizaytikka izan go7ettibeetenna.
Histikko ta ishato! Inte giddon minni ooththizayta Godan intefe bollara diza halaqatanne intena zorizayta inte bonchana mala nu intena woossos.
Iza yelidayti hessatho giday oonikka Yesusa izi Kirstoosa giidi markattiday wuri Ayhudata woossa keeththafe goodettana mala Ayhudati kase seera ooththida gish Ayhudatas babbidi gida.
Tumu qaxxarettidayti, Xoosse woossizayti, Yesus Kirstoosan ceeqqizayti, ashon ceeqqettontaytinne ashonka ammanetontayti nuna.
Iza azazoykka nu iza Naaza Yesus Kirstoosa ammananasinne izi nuna azazida mala nuni nu giddon dossettana malassa. *
Qasseka hara do7ay biittafe kezishin beyadis. Izas qas dorsa kace mala nam7u kacey dees. Izi daweththo haasayees.
Ta ishato! Inte inte qofan guutha nayta mala gidoppite. Iita oosos gidikko guutha nayta mala gidite. Qofan gidikko kaha kunthida asata gidite.
Inte garsan metotiza asi dizee? Diza gidikko izi woosso. Ufayetizadey dizee? Diza gidikko ufaysa yeth yexo.
Hessa gish daaburida inte qesenne inte gulbate minisite. *
Oonakka dumma shaakki maadonta issa issas izaade ooso mala pirdiza Xoossa “Izi nu Aawa” giidi inte xeygikko hayssa alamezan inte imathenne bete as gididi diza wode ubban izas babbite.
Inte Xoossa shene polidi izi intes immida ufaysa qaala ekkanas minni eqqanas intena koshshees.
Ammano geethi issi miishe hanana giidi nu sidhonta dishe beyonta miisheka beyida mala ero gi ekko.
Ayzaabeta mala coo mela qofan mela simeretanas intes bessenna gaada ta intena zorays.
Hessa gish muussan woykko ushshan, issife bonchon woykko agina xeeroninne Sambata gallas boncho gish inte bolla oonikka pirdofo. *
Hessa gish Xoossa alga sinthan de7idi qammanne gallas iza keeththan izas ooththetes. Alga bolla uttidaysi ba bonchora beettidi istas kuwaso gidana.
Gido attin Phawuloosi duge wodhdhidi naaza bolla hokki idimmidinne “Hayqibenna paxa dees, daggammofte!” gides.
Hessa gish Kirstoosa baggara diza atottethinne merna boncho demmana doorettidayta gish gaada wursakka dandayadis.
Ammano siiqotethan inte issoy issa yeeri ekkidi saroketite. Intes Kirstoosaytas ubbas saroy gido.
Inte Kirstoosa bonchos giidi yashshara issoy issas azazetite.
Ta ishato! Inte qas hessa kasetidi erida gish hanko makalata bala geedon goosheti biidi kase inte minni dizasoppe kundonta mala naagetite.
Macheto! Goda achchan intes bessiza miish gidida gish inte azinatas azazetite. *
Harati beydi naagettana mala nagara ooththizayta asa ubba sinthan hanqa.
Hessa gish nuni nu garsan issoy issa bolla pirdanappe ane naagetos. Hessa aggidi nu ishas dhuphe gidizayssa woykko iza oykiza narxa wothonta mala ane nu naagetos.
Gidikkoka lo7o ooththizades oonaska Ayhuda asas gidin Ayzaabetas sabay, sarotethinne bonchoy gidana.
tama wolqa toyssida; qara mashshafe kessi ekki attida; daaburappe minnida; Olason goobata gidida; alaga asa ola goodida; *
Tani Yesusa malata ta asatethan tookkadis; hessa gish ha7i tana oonikka waaysenna.
Hessafe guye issi mino kiitanchay wolqama woxa shuch misatiza issi shuch denthidi “Gita katamaya Baabiloona hessathoka wolqara sugetada kundana. Hayssafe guye mulekka beettuku. *
Ta ishato! Inte qasse ubbafe bollara inte geeshsha ammanon minni eqqite; Xillo Ayananka minni woossite.
Lo7o, ufaysizazinne kumeth gidida Xoossa sheney aazakkonne inte paaci erana mala inte qofan oraxidi laametite attin hayssa alame asa misatoppite.
Hayssa alameza woykko ha alamezan diza ay miishekka dosoppite. Oonikka ha alameza dosikko Aawa siiqoy izaade achchan deenna.

Hessa gish neno hara bolla pirdizaysso neni ta hanni geedon ooththadis giza gaasoy nees deenna. Ne hara asa bolla pirdizayssan nerka nees kunane ekkaasa. Gaasoyka hara asa bolla ne pirdizayssa nekka zaarada iza ooththiza gishassa. *

Waannati Yaqoobey, Phexroossinne Yohansikka taas imettida Xoossa imota akeekidi taasinne Barnabaasas ba ushacha kushe immida; hessafe guye nuni Ayzaabetas isti qas Ayhudatas qaala yootanas qaala ero gi ekkida.

Wotadarati Yesusa kaqqidappe guye iza may7oza ekkidi wotadarata issa issa gakkana mala oyddu kessi shaakerethida. Garsara may7iza may7ozakka hessatho shaakerethida. Gido attin giddora may7iza may7ozi siketonta pudeppe duge gakkanaas coo yeda dees.
histikko neni harata tamarso agada ne hu7es aazas tamarikii? Ne hara asi kaysotoppa ga sabakashe nees kaysotay?
Inte asatethay inte gaaththan diza Xillo Ayanas duussaso gididayssa inte erekketii? He Ayanaykka inte Xoossafe ekidayssa. Inteka intes gidekketa. *
Kirstoosi ubbas issito hayqqoyssanne haray wurikka izara issife hayqqidayssa nu erida gish Kirstoosa siiqoy nuna wolqara oosises.
Hessa gish saloppe xeeyssi intena gakkin ammaniza nu ishato! Nu ammanos Hawaarenne Qeeseta halaqa gidida Yesusa qoppite.

‘Ha ekkizadefe gede immizadey anjetidade’ giza Goda Yesusa qaala nu yuushi qoppidi nurka nu kushera nu ooththi demmidi hara daaburanchata gede maaddanas nuus bessizayssa ta intena daro dumma dumma ogera besadis” gides.
Ekoy geloy ubba asa achchan bonchetto. Inte hiithey geesh gido. Gaasoyka layma amoy dizaytanne laymatizayta bolla Xoossi pirdana.
Duufoza hokki xeelidi ahay izan xaaxettida may7oy xalla dizayssa beyides; gido attin gede duufoza giddo gellibeenna.
Wolqanthi, dada giirissinne gugunthi, gita biitta qaathi hanides. Asi biitta bolla medhetosappe hanno gakkanaas hessa malay biitta bolla hani erenna. *

Takka he kiitanchazas goynnanaas iza toho bolla ta liiphen gufannadis-shin izi tana “Agga! Hessatho ooththofa! Takka nenara Yesus Kirstoosa markateth oykkida ishatara issife ooththizade; neni Xoossas goynna! Yesusa markay tinbite Ayana” gides.
Xoossi gidikko hessa ba Ayana baggara nuus qoncisides. Ayanaykka Xoossas diza ciimma yo7o ashshonta wursi pilgi xeelles.
Inte iza keehi ufayssan mokki ekkite. Iza mala asataka bonchite.
Nayto! Inte Goda ufayssana mala inte intena yelidaytas ubba miishan azazetite. *

Histikko nu ceeqeteththi hayssa mala. Ha alamezan harappeka intessara nuussara diza gaytoteththan Xoossafe gidida geeshshatethaninne suuretethan nu de7idayssa nu woznay nuus markatees. Hessika asa cincateththan gidonta Xoossa kiyatethanna.
“Ta azazo ekkidi ooththizadey tana dosees; tana dosizaddekka ta Aaway doosees; Takka iza dosana; Tanaka izaades qoncisana” gides.

Ha azazoti barka bappe medhi ekkida goynno qofay coo bessonta ashketethinne ba asateth naaqi oythan istas tumu aadho erateth dizayta misatetes. Gido attin asho amoteth shiishshi oykiza wolqay istas baawa.
Ne bolla ay mala siiqoy dizaakkonne isti ne gish Woosa Keeththa asa sinthan markattida. Isti biza ogen Xoosse ufaysiza hanon ne ista maaddikko lo7o ooththassa.
Go7aynne hidotay baynda eeyata palamappe haakka. Ayssi giikko hessanta malay oosh kaaleththizayssa ne eraassa.
Nunikka Goda boncho mastoote mala xolqettishe iza misatanas ha bonchofe gede hara bonchon laamettana. Hessika Ayana gidida Godappe.
Merna Ayanan bana wosoy baynda yarsho ooththi Xoossas shiishida Kirstoosa suuthi nuni de7o Xoossas goynnanas hayqetha oosoppe nuna ay mala aaththi geeshshandee?
Hessa gish nuni Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ammanishin nuus immida Xillo Ayana Xoossi istas immikko histin Xoossara eqqetanas tani oonee?” gides.
Inte attana gallassas atamettida Xoossa Xillo Ayana mishisoppite.

Hessa gish neni ay mala timirte ekkidakkone ne siyoyssa yuusha qopanne naaga. Maarotethanka gela; neni beeggonta aggiko qas ta kayso mala ne qopponta putu gaana. Ta ay saaten neeko yaanakkonne ne erakka. *
Ta nayto! Intena oonikka baleththonta mala naagetite. Izi xillo gidida mala xillo ooththizadeykka xillo.
Ta ishato! Ayana wursi ammanoppite; gido attin ayanati Xoossafekonne paaci beyte. Gasoykka daro wordo nabeti biitta bolla laalettida.
Hessa gish ta ishato! Nagaras maarotethi beettizay Yesusa baggara gididayssi intes sabaketidayssa erite.
Ta ishato! Hayssafe hara ta intena gizay Godan ufayetite. Ha7ikka zaarada izo ta intes xaafikko tana salethenna. Intenaka go7ana.
Inte shiiqiza shiiqoy pirdas gidonta mala intefe oonikka gafiddaddey diikko kasetidi ba soon mo. Hanko attidayssa tani hara wode he inteko baada woga wothana.
Philaxoosika “Inte iza ekki biidi inte woga mala pirdite” gides. Ayhudata ayssizayti qasse zaaridi “Nu asi wodhana mala nuus piqadey imettibenna” gides.
Gido attin inte wurikka ubbafe aadhdhiza imoteth lo7ethi koyite. Qasseka hara ubbafe aadhdhiza oge ta intena bessana.
Hessa gish nuus koshshiza Qeeseta halaqay hessa mala geeshshinne wosoy iza bolla baynda xillonne nagaranchatappe shaaketidi salotappe bollara bonchettida Qeeseta halaqa.
Taas wolqa immiza Kirstoosan tani ubba miishe ooththanas dandayays.
Xoossa sheney inte laymappe hakkidi dummatanassa.
Beegidi galatara gaththi pacey baynda Xoossa woossite.
Musey hessa siyida mala Midiyaame biitta beettidi heen bete as gidi de7ides; Yaanka nam7u attuma naa yelides. *
Addey ba hu7e gulluntanas bessenna. Attumasi Xoossa leemisonne Xoossa boncho. Macassi gidikko addes boncho. *
Inte wurikka issi asho gididi sarotethas xeeygetida Kirstoosa sarotethi inte woznan kawoto. Inte galatizayta gidite.
Hanizay wurikka izappe izas medhetida Xoossi daro nayta bonchos efanas ista maarotethas hu7e gidida Yesusi waayen polanas koshizaz gidides.
Inte giddon diza olaynne ooshay awappe yidee? Inte woznan diza amotethafe dendida ola gidenee?
Inte garsan yeellachiza laymay dizayssi woretees. Hessa mala tunatethi ammanonta dereta achchanka deenna. Ba aawa macho ekkida asi intekon dees. *

Asa bolla gakkida paaceppe hara aadhdhiza paacey inte bolla gakkibeenna. Xoossi ammanettiza Xoosse gidida gish inte dandayonta inte wolqafe bollara inte paacetenna mala izi intena aggaggenna. Gido attin inte paacetiza wode he paaceza inte dandayana mala wolqa immidi paaceppe inte kessi ekkana oge izi intes giigissana.
Ta bidappe guye Xoossa dorsatas michetonta iita asati inte gars gellanayssa ta erays.
Hessa gish inte bolla gakkida goodeteththaninne meto ubban inte minnida gish nuni nu baggara inte dandaya gishshinne inte ammano gish ammaniza asa ubba achchan ceeqqettos.
Xoosse beyida asi oonikka baawa. Nuni nu giddon siiqetiza gidikko Xoossi nunan daana. Iza siiqoykka nunan polettana. *
Asi kiittidade gidonta Yesus Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthida iza aawa Xoossafe kiitettida Phawuloosappe.
Histikko inte daaburidi hidota qanxonta mala hessathoka nagaranchatappe kase iza bolla gakkida hessa mala eqeteth dandayida Yesusa qoppite.
Nuni hessa mala hayqon izara issino gidikko qasse denthanka izara issino gidoos.
Qasseka “Ayzaabeto! Inteka Xoossa deretara ufayetite” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides. *
Wode wursisetha bolla issi issi asay ammano aggidi baleththiza ayanatanne iita ayana timirte kaallanayssa Xillo Ayanay qoncera yootees.
Asay dere ayssizaytas haarettana malanne lo7o gidida miish wursi ooththanas giiga gidana mala asa qofisa.
Heyti he asati kase daro wodeppe kase saloy Xoossa qaalan medhetoyssanne biittaykka haaththafenne haaththan dizayssa erishe kaadetes. *
Kirstoosikka nuna Xoossako shiishshanaas izi ba hu7es Xillokko shin hanko Xillo gidonta nu nagara gish nam7anthetonta mala issito waayetidi hayqqides. Izi ashon hayqqides shin Ayanan qas paxides.
Isti xillotetha oge shaakki eridappe guye istas imettida geeshsha azazozappe guye simmanappe isti kase he xillotetha ogeza eronta aggidakko istas lo7oshin.
Ta ishato! Ooso ooththonta asappenne inte nuuppe ekkida timirteza mala doonta ammanizaytappe inte haakkana mala Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan intena nu azazoos.
Hessa gish nagaray issade gaason duge ha alameza yida mala hayqoyka nagara gaason yides. Hayqoyka hessa baggara asa ubbakko yides. Hessas gaasoy asi wurikka iza baggara nagara ooththida gishassa. *
Heytanti ammanon kawota xoonida; suure pirda pirdida; baas imettida hidota qaala ekkida; gaammota duuna gordida; *
Nu goodetikkokka wora wodhdhi attokko. Isti nuna shoci gendersikkoka nu dhayokko.
Inteno laymatizayto! Alamera siiqetethi Xoossara morketeth gididayssa ereketii? Hessa gish hayssa alamezara siiqetethi koyizay wurikka Xoossas morke.
Phawuloosinne izara diza zatati qaala Iisiyan sabakonta mala Xillo Ayanay diggida gish Pirgiyaranne Galatiya derera aadhdhi bida.
Ammanon beettiza xillotethi qasse hizgees “Ne woznara pude salo oonee kezanay? gooppa” hessatho guussi Kirstoosa saloppe duge ha wothana guussa.
Koyro kiitanchazi biidi xu7aza biitta bolla gussides. Do7aza malatay ista bollanne he do7aza misiles goynnizayata bolla iita waayssiza madunth kezides. *

He xaatha maxaafaza ekkida mala oyddu do7atinne nam7u tammanne oyddu cimati he dorsa sinthan ba liiphen gupannida. Istika issoy issoy ba kushen diiththa mala miish oykkides. Hessathoka geeshshata woosa gidida izan exaney kumida worqa xaaro ba kushen oykki deettes.*
Yesusi izi Kirstoosa gididayssa ammanizay wuri Xoossafe yeletides. Aawa dosizay wuri naazakka izatho dossees.
Nuni issoy issa iitas dentheththishenne qanatettishe coo mela ceeqqettizayssa ane aggos.
Cima asa ne Aawa mala bonchora zora attin dom7ofa. Naatetha attuma nayta ne ishata mala xeella.

Oone erizay “Intena isti iita ooththetes” giidi asay zigirikkokka Xoossi nuna beyanas yiza gallas Ayzaabeti inte oosoy lo7o gididayssa be7idi Xoosse galatana mala inte istara diza wode inte amaley lo7o gido.
Muse wogas zil7etizayssa gidikko tani kase Woossa Keeththa goodizadde. Woga naagon beettiza xillotethi gidikko kase ta bolla issi wosoykka deenna. *
Shuumezikka naazi ay saaten paxidakkone ista zaari oychides. Istika izas “Qamma gallassafe laapun saaten iza michizayssi aggides” gida. †

Hessafe guye Ayhudata daannati kaqettida asata meqeth wodirappe menthidi isti iza masqale bollafe wothana mala Philaxoosa woossida. Isti hessa ooththiday Ayhudati sambatas giigettiza gallas gidida gishshinne he sambataykka daro gita ba7aale gidida gish Sambata gallas ahay masqale bolla gam7onta mala koyda gishassa.

Philaxoosi hessa Yesusa haasaya siyidappe guye iza birshi yeddana koyides shin Ayhudatas babbida gish isti “Ne hayssa addeza birshikko Oroome Kawo Qeesare bagga gidakka; gaasoykka bana barka kawothizadey wuri Qeesares morke” gishe wurikka waassida.
Kaaleththidka Yesusi “Inte woznay metotoppo; Xoosse ammanite; tanaka ammanite.
Ay ogerakka intenara eqetizaytas hirgofte. Hessi isti dhayanayssassinne inte atanayssas Xoossafe imettida malata.
Ta intena dooradis attin inte tana dooribekketa; inte biidi daro ayfe ayfana mala inte ayfey eqqi daana mala ta intena wothadis; hessa gish inte ta sunthan woossidayssa wursi Aaway intes immana.

Aabeeley Xoossas Qayeele yarshofe aadhdhiza yarsho ammanon shiishshides. Xoossi iza yarshoza gish haasayishe izi ammanon geesh gididayssa markattides. Izi hayqqinka iza ammanoy ha7i gakkanaas hasayettes. *
Hessa gidida gish asi wurikka nuna Kirstoosa oosanchata malanne Xoossa xuura qoncisanas hadara ekkida asa mala qoodanas bessees.
Wolqama assura carkoy carkidi mitha ayfe qoqofiza mala saloppe xoolintey qoqofetides. *
Hessa gish ta siiqoto! Eeqas goynnoppite; izappe hakkite.
Iita lo7o ooson xoona attin iitan xoonetofa.
Hayta ha yo7ota gish asa qofiso aggofa. Asay ba giddon issoy issara qaala geedon paalametonta mala Xoossa sunthan zora. Hessa mala yo7oy siyizayta moores.
Xoossako shiiqite; izikka inteko shiiqana. Inteno nagaranchato! Inte inte kushe geeshshite, inte nam7u qofan qaxizayto! Inte inte wozna geeshshite.
Inte bessonta maado maaddikko nagara ooththeta. Woga sinthanka inte woga yedhidade gidi qoodettana.
Xoossi nuna geeshshateththas xeygides attin tunatethas xeygibenna.
Tuma ba iitatethaninne makalan tucci oykkizayta iitatetha bollanne ista makalatetha ubba bolla Xoossa hanqoy saloppe qoncana.
Ta ishato! Siiqoy Xoossafe gidida gish nuni ane siiqetos. Asa siiqiza asi wuri Xoossafe yeletidadenne Xoosse erizade.
Poo7on dayssi gishe ba isha ixizadey ha7ikka dhuman dees.
Inte Kirstoosa suntha gish cayettikko boncho Ayanay hessika Xoossa Ayanay inte bolla shempiza gish ufayeetite.
Phawuloosi asa wursi sarothidappe guye Xoossi iza baggara Ayzaabeta giddon ooththidayssa wursi issino ashshonta yootides.
Inte giddofe tana ne hanno nagara ooththadasa giidi markara laththanas mootana dandayizadey dizee? Ta tumu haasayizade gidikko histin aazas tana ammanekketii?
Qasseka “Ta ista nagaranne makala nam7antho qoppikke” gees Goday. *
Gaasoy ay yo7onka; hessikka haasayan gidin eratetha inte ubban duretideta.
Ta ishato! Tani Xoossa woossan baaxetiza mala inteka tanara baaxettana mala ta intena Goda Yesus Kirstoosaninne Xillo Ayana siiqon woossays.
Dereyka iza “Ne bolla daydanthi dees! Nena wodhana koyizay oonnee?” gides. *
Iza suuthan gidida ammanon nagarappe maarettana yarsho histidi Xoossi Yesusa shiishshides. Izi hessa ooththiday kasetidi poletida nagara qaxayonta dandayan aadhdhida ba xilloteth bessanasa.
Wodey meeggiza wode gidida gish oosanchatinne ashkarati tama eththidi eqqon ho7ettes. Phexroosikka istara eqqidi ho7ees.
Dabulosa gene ooso inte eqetanas dandayana mala Xoossa ola may7ota mayte.
Phexroosi “Godo! Ta nena ha7i kaallanas ays dandayikkinaa? Haray attoshin tani ta shempoka ne gish aaththa immana” gides.
Asa qofappe bollara diza Xoossa sarotethi inte woznanne inte qofa wursi Yesus Kirstoosan naagees.
Nuni nu inxarsayra Godanne Aawa anjjoos. Izinka Xoossa leemison medhetida asa nayta zaaridi qangoos. *

Inte mela ammanonta laymatiza asara gidonta woykko coo gaphigaphizaytara, kaysotizaytara, eeqas goynnizaytara gaaggofte guus gidonta dishin ha7i ta xaafiday ammanays gishe laymatizaytara woykko mathotizaytara, gaphigaphizaytara, eeqas goynnizaytara, asa sunth moorizaytara woykko cayzaytara, asa miish bonqizadentara intes issifeteth dooppo. Heytanta malara haray atto shin kaththika issife moopte.
“Takka ta baggara Naazirete Yesusa sunthas eqqetanas bessees gaada qoppadis shin; *

Istas nagara oosoppe naagetonta amottiza ayfey dees. Istas nagara ooso siiqiza amotethi ay wodekka simmenna. Ammanon buro minni eqqonta asata baleththettes. Miishshas gaphigaphettes. Isti qangetidayta.
Miishera qaxarettidi heemmizadey gidikko dorsati izas gidonta gish kana suytey yiza wode dorsata yeggidi baas baqatees. Kana suyteykka dorsata dafi dafi meessinne laalles. *
Dosettida ta ishato! Hayssa yuushi qoppite; asi wurikka siyanas eesoto; haasayassinne hanqos eesotoppo.
Hessathoka Mishiraachcho qaala sabakizayti baasi koshshizayssa Mishiraachcho qaala ooththizasoppe ekkana mala Goday woga woththides. *
Tana ammanizay wuri dhuman doonta mala ta poo7o gidada hayssa ha alameza yadis.
Hessafe guye Yesusi addeza Xoossa Keeththan demmidi “Hekko ha7i ne paxadasa; kaseyssafe aadhdhiza iita miishi ne bolla gakkonta mala nam7antho nagara ooththofa” gides
Inte ooththizaz wursikka siiqon ooththite.
“Inte tana dosiza gidikko ta azazoyo naagite.
