Intes yootizayssa inte akay goonta mala naagetite; heytanti Xoossi biitta bolla diza asa baggara istas yootizayssa ekkonta ixidi izappe attanas dandayonta aggikko nuni saloppe yidayssi nuus yootishin nu ekkonta ixikko izappe waanidi attanee? *
Inte Xoosse eranappe kase Xoosse gidonta eeqatas aylleta.
Xoossi naaza denthida wode intena issa issa inte iitatethafe zaaridi anjana mala kasetidi inteko kiittides” gides.
“Izi Ayhudata dereninne Yerusalame kataman ooththidayssa ubbas nu marka. Qasseka asay iza mitha bolla kaqqi wodhides.
Ta ishato! Inte garsan shaaketethi doonta mala intes issi woznaynne issi qofay daana mala inte inte garsan issino gidana mala Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan ta intena woossays.
Inte iita amale gaason kase inte Xoossafe shaaketidi inte inte qofara izas morketakkoshin.
Paanthatetha iita amotethafe baqata. Geeshsha woznara Goda xeygiza asatara xilloteth, ammano, siiqonne saroteth kaalla.
Histikko inte Kirstoosara issife dendidayta gidikko Kirstoosi Xoossa achchan uttidason puden diza hanotetha koyite. *

Koyro kiitanchazi ba zayeza punnides; shachchinne suuthi walakettida tamay medhettidi duge biitta bolla yegettides; biittafe cigoy xuugettides; Mithafekka cigoy xuugetides; Cilila maataykka wuri xuugetides. *
Qasseka “Kasekka, ha7ikka dizaysso! Ubbaakka dandayiza Goda Xoosso! Neni ne gita Godatethaa ne kushen oykkida gishshinne kawotida gish nuni nena galatoos.
Yesusikka Izis “Xoossa immotaynne nena ‘Tana haaththe ushsha’ gizadey izi oonakkonne ne erizakko ne iza woossanas bessees. Izikka nees de7o haaththe immanakkoshin” gides.
Intes de7o gidida Kirstoosi qonciza gallas inteka he wode izara issife bonchora qoncana.
Gido attin Yesusi izi Masihe, Xoossa naa gididayssa inte erana malanne inte iza sunthan ammanidi de7o demmana mala hayssi xaafetides.
Nu qasse Xoossa bagga; Xoosse erizay nu gizaz siyana shin Xoossa bagga gidontaddey gidikko nu gizaz siyenna. Tuma Ayananne wordo ayana nu shaakki erizay hayssana.

Hayti ha asati yeellay baynda layma hanora issi bolla inte diggisseson beettiza wode intes dhuphe gidettes. Isti baas xalala qoppeetes. Isti carkon biza iray baynda shaara mala. Ayfey ayfiza woden ayfey baynda xaphoppe dhoqalletidi nam7uto melida mitha mala.
Hessa gaason Phexroosi aadhdhishin haray attin iza eeshoy harganchatappe bagga harganchata bolla wodhdhana mala hargizayti ichchiza alga bollanne hala bolla karen ishiseetes.
Heytantafeka bollara tama mala poppol7u giza iita ayana wondafeta inte wursi toyssana dandayana mala ammano gondalle mala denthite.
Inte ooththiza miish wursi asas gidonta Godas ooththiza mala taybidi kumeththa woznappe ooththite.
Issito maana kaththas ba bayrateth bayzida Eesawe mala intefe oonikka laymatizade woykko Xoosse bonchontadde gidi beettonta mala naagetite. *-
Isti gidikko “Nuus Barbaane birsha attin hayssa deenna!” giidi waassida. Barbaaney ba hu7es panga.
kaadizayta, naagetontayta, coo mela otoretethan kumidayta, Xoossafe aaththidi lo7o deeth dosizayta gidana.
Hessa gish Xoossi iza daro dhoqu histides. Suntha ubbafe dhoqu gida sunth izas immides.
Goda Yesus Kirstoosa wolqafe izas yuussa gish nu intes yootida wode nuni nu ayfera iza bonchoza beyidi markattos attin asi coo mela medhi ekkidi gene haasayiza hayssi7e mala gidenna.

Izi hayssa ha hanoza gish ba kiitatan ubban hayssathoka xaafides. Iza kiitata giddon eranas waayssiza issi issi hanoti deettes. Eratethi istas paccidaytinne nam7u qofan yooqu gizayti hara Geeshsha Maxaafata mirqizayssathokka haytaka isti mirqana. Isti hessatho ooththizay baas dhayanassa.
Hawaareti Barnabaassinne Phawuloosi hessa siyida mala ba may7o daakkidi gede dereza giddo woxxida; ba qaala dhoqu histidi hizgida;
Kase aawatas imettida hidota qaala polanas Xoossa tumatethi erettana mala Kirstoosi Ayhudatas ooththizade gididayssa ta intes yootays.
Ba duuna naagonta barka ba wozna baleththishe ta ammanays gizaddey barka bana baleththees. Iza ammanoyka mela hada ammano.
‘Ashkaray godappe aadhdhenna’ gaada ta kase intes yootoyssa yuushi qoppite; isti tana goodizayti intenaka gooddana; Isti ta qaala naagizakko inte qaala naagana.
Yesusi bana ammanida Ayhudata “Inte tumu ta qaalan diikko inte tumappe tana kaallizayta gidana.
“He wode Kanaaneninne Gibxen daro meto ehida gita koshay dendides. Nu aawataska miza kaththi dhayides. *
Ne naytappe baggati Aawappe nuus imettida azazoza mala tuman minni dizayta ta beyida gish daro ufayetadis.
Issi asi ba dabbota harappeka baso asa maaddontayssa gidikko izi ammano kaadidadenne ammanonta asappekka aadhdhi iita asa.
nuni nu iita qofappe geeyanas nu wozna aracettidi nu asatethaka xillo haaththan meecetidi tumu woznappenne kumeththa ammanon Xoossako ane shiiqoos. *
Gido attin “Beni nuna ammano gish goodi dhayssana koyiza addezi ha7i he ammano zaari sabakkes” giza wore xalla siyida.
Hessa gish inte kath maana mala ta intena woossays. Inte miikko minnana; mulekka aykko qohoykka inte bolla gakkenna” gides.
Neni dandayan minna eqqidayssanne ta suntha gish saletonta ne waaye beyidayssa ta erays.
Cima asay woznama, bonchettidayta, bana barka haarizayta; amanoninne siiqon dandayanka lo7o gidana mala ista zora.
Kasetidi Xoossi hayssa mala hanota asay eronta ooththidayssa dandayan aadhdhides; ha7i gidikko asi wuri ba dizason dizason maarotethan gelana mala azazees” gides.
Yesusa masqale achchan iza aayeyanne aayeyi micheya Qaliyoopha macha Maaramanne Meg dale geetettizasoppe yida Maarama heen eqqida.
Izi qas suuthan maadhettida may7o may7ides. Iza sunthay qas “Xoossa qaala” geatetes.
Gido attin inte metoy baawa guussan ooththizays ammanon minnonta asas dhuphe gidonta mala naagetite.
Qasseka izi wooqontayssanne Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthidayssa shaakki erana mala ‘Anjettidayssanne ammanettida Dawute anjo ta intes immana’ gides. *
Tani ta Aawan diza mala inteka tanan dizayssanne takka intenan dizayssa inte he wode erandeta.
Nu iza azazota polikko nu iza eridaysa hessan ammanettos.
Inte ta oonakkonne eridi ammanonta aggikko inte inte nagarara hayqqana gish ta inte inte nagarara hayqqana giday hessa gishassa” gides.
Hinna he macasaya geeshshata suuthaninne Yesusa sunthan hayqqida asa suuthan mathotidaro tani beyadis. Ta izo beyada daro malaletadis.
Eesawey guyeppe kase ba anjoza laattanas zaari koyin izas imettonta diggettidayssa inte ereeta. Izi bana gakkiza anjozaska daro yeekkishe koyidikka zaari demmanas dandaybenna. **
Dereyka iza gish giddora sasuki haasayettides. Issi issi asati “Izi lo7o asa” gishin baggay qasse “Lo7o gidenna. Izi dere baleththees” gida.
Goda maadoykka istara dees; Qoodan keehi daro asay ammanidi Godakko simmides.

Gido attin nu Mishiraachcho qaala hadara ekkanas dandayiza asata mala Xoossi nuna qoodida gish nu hasayos; hessaka nu ooththizay nu wozna paaci eriza Xoossa ufayssanas attin as ufayssanas giidi gidenna.
Gido attin Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus xoono immiza Xoossas galatay gido.
Qasse tumappe maadoy baynda, barka diza am7eya Xoosse xalla xeellawus. Woossassinne Xoossafe maado demmanas gallassinne qamma minetawus.
Hanno gakkanaas inte ta sunthan aykkokka woossi erekketa; woossite inte ekkana; inte ufayssaykka kumeth gidana.

Ammaniza wode ne ayllee? Ne hessas daro metotoppa; wozettana dandayikko wozeta. Gaasoyka aylle gidi dishe Goda ammanidadey izi Goda goqa. Hessathoka ammaniza wode goqa gidontaddey izi Kirstoosas aylle.
Heyti asa issa issafe shaakkizayta; asho amoteth kaallizaytanne istan Xillo Ayanay bayndayta.
Inte Kirstoosa kiyatethan xeygidayssa aggagidi hara dumma shaako Mishiraachcho qaalakko simmidayssi tana daro malalises.
Asi ubbara saro daana mala intes dandayettizayssa wursi ooththite. Geeyana mala koyite. Geeshshatethi baynda Goda beyanas dandayettenna.
Izikka “Giteza wogolozappe ushacha baggara abban yeggite; inte demmana” gida gish giteza abba giddo yeggidanne daro moley oyketida gish giteza molezara goochana dandaybeetenna. *
Qaxxaretin qaxxaretonta aggin nam7aanka go7ay baawa. Waanna ayfe yo7oy Xoossa azazo polo.
Zorizadey gidikko zoro; bayndaytas immizadey gujji immo. Ayssizaddey minni aysso. Maarizadeykka ufayssan maaro.
“Inte ammanida wode Xillo Ayana ekkideti?” gides; Istika “Ekkibeykko haray attoshin Xillo Ayanay dizaakkonne nu sibeykko” gida.
Hayssa nu kiittida qaalas azazettontay oonikka diikko hessa misatizade lo7ethi kaallitenne izi ba ooson yeelatana mala izara gaggofte.
Ta ishato! Ta hayssa intes yootays ashoynne suuthi Xoossa kawoteth laattettenna. Dhayanayssi dhayontayssa laattenna.
Dhayana kaththas ooththofte. Gido attin hessafe aaththidi Xoossa aaway ammanthiza maatame iza bolla shocida gish Asa Nay intes immiza merna de7os gidiza kaththas ooththite” gides.
Inte inte asho ufayssanas iita qofan woossiza gish woossidayssa inte ekeketa.
Hessan Xoossa Aawa, Goda Yesus Kirstoosa suntha ubba miishas ubba wode galattite.
Ane inte Abrahaame gish qoppite; geeshsha Maxaafan “Izi Xoosse ammanin ammanoy izas xillotethan qoodettides” geetetti xaafettides. *
Xoossa bonchoy izis poo7iza gishshinne Dorsazi izi poo7o gidida gish he katamays awa arshey woykko aginay poo7isanas koshshenna. *
Inte qasse Xoossa Ayanay intenan diza gidikko ashon gidonta Ayanan deeta. Kirstoosa Ayanay iza bolla bayndadey Kirstoosas gidenna.
Isti ammanonta minni eqidasoppe simmikko kase baso simmi gelana. Xoossika ista zarsi gelthana dandayes.
Isti wordo haasaya erettenna. Wosoyka ista bolla baawa. *
“Gido attin ta nees qoncisana koyizay isti wordo giza Goda ogera nu aawanta Xoossas gooynayssinne Muse woganne nabeta maxaafan xaafetidayssaka ubba ammanays.
Inte garsan issoy issara siiqetethafe attin oona bollaka accoy dooppo. As siiqiza asi izi woga polides.
Asaykka wolqama seelan xuugetides. He boshata bolla sheney izas diza Xoossa sunth asay cayides attin maarotethan gelibeenanne izakka bonchibenna.

Izis tammanne nam7u pengetara diza gita adussa ginbe lashay dees. He tammanne nam7u pengetan tammanne nam7u kiitanchati eqqidi naagetes. He pengeta bolla tammanne nam7u Isra7eele kochchata sunthi xaafeti uttides.
“Mitha bolla kaqettiza asi qangetidade” geetetti xaafettida gish Kirstoosi nu gish qangetidade gididi nuna woga qangethafe wozides. *
Tani kase Ayhudata ammanon waana dizaakkonne Xoossa Woosa Keeththe ta ay mala goodidakkonne qasse mule dhayssanas ta ay mala dafettidakkonne inte siyideta. *
He daweza oykkidi shi layth qachides. Hessi dawezi Dabuloosa woykko Xala7e geetettiza kase beni shooshaza. *
Gido attin hessafe kase he katamayin maro marotidi Samaariya asa daro malalisizaz ooththiza issi Simoona geetettiza maroy dees. Izikka bana gita asa mala qoodizade.
Kirstoosanne izi hayqqi dendida dentha wolqa ta erana mala iza waayekka ta izara gishettana malanne hayqonka ta iza misatana mala amottays.
Xoossa oosos dooranas, oona bollakka ne kushe wotha woossanas eesotoppa. Qasse haratara nagara ooththanas zupetoppa. Nagarappe nena xillotethan naaga.
Hessathoka cima macasati ba diza duussan bonchora dizaytanne lo7o hanoteth asa tamarsizayta gidetto attin asa sunth iissizayta woykko woyne cajje ushsha suuken waaxetidayta gidonta mala ista tamarsa.
Hessa gish geela7oyo ekidadey lo7o ooththides. Ekontadeyka aadhdhetha lo7o ooththides.
Qaalay gizayssa ooththite attin mela sisi xalala siyizadenta gididi interka intena baleththofte.
Hessafe guye Yesusi Galila giddon yuuyetides. Gido attin Yuhudan yuuyanas koybenna. Gaasoyka Ayhudati iza wodhdhana koyiza gishassa.
Intena qasse Xoossi Yesus Kirstoosara issifetethi daana mala ooththides. Hessa gish Xoossi Yesus Kirstoosa nu erateth, nu xilloteth, nu geeshshatethinne nuna ashshizade gidana mala ooththides.
Toho meeciza gongen haaththe gujjidi bana kaallizayta toho meeche oykkides; Ba gixxida pooxanka meecida tohoza quccides.
Hayssa ha ogeza kaalliza asata ubba wodhana gakkanaas goodaththiza asakkoshin; macatanne addeta qacha qacha qasho keeththe yeddizadekkoshin.
Hessa gish iza gaason derey ba giddon shaaketi wodhdhides.
Intes hadara imettida Xoossa wude naagite. He iza wudeza wolqara gidonta Xoossi koyiza ogera dosara heemmite. Miishes yiqetethan gidonta hagazanas woznappe koshshan gido. *
Hayqoy izara dukkiza wolqay nagara; nagara wolqay woga.

Inte inte woznan woththite; inte kath maxishe peydaytas ista wolqa waaga inte qanxonta aggida gish inte bolla waassishe inte achchan deettes. Kath maxizayta waasoy ubba dandayiza Goda haythan gakkides. *
Hessa gish iitateth wursi, baleththo wursi, qoodheppe qommon hano, qanateteth aykko qommo zigirs intefe diggite.
Issi macassi azinay paxa diza wode kumeththan ba azinara qashetadus. Azinay hayqqikko ba koyda as gelana dandayawus. Iza gelanadey ammanizade gido attin gelu.
Heyti tumatethafe haakkidi coo mela waayetes. Istika hayqoppe denthi hayssafe kase hanni aadhdhides giidi issi issi asa ammano guye shiri yeggeetes.
Asi Yesus Kirstoosan diikko qaxxaretin woykko qaxxaretonta aggin aynne go7enna; go7ay dizay siiqon qonciza ammanon xalla.
Hessa baggara pacey bayndade gidi beettidayssafe guye bana azazettizaytas ubbaas merna atotethas gaaso gidides.
Ha7i qasse ammanizaytas miisha keso gish Galatiyan diza Woosa Keeththatas tani immida azazo mala inteka ooththite. *
Macheto inte Godas haarettiza mala inte azinatas haarettite. *
Qasse Yesusi “Tani alames poo7o. Tana kaallizadey wuri de7o poo7o demmana. Dhuman simeretenna” giidi istas yootides. *
Inte ta siiqoto! Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Hawaareti hayssafe kase yootida qaala akeekite.
Izi asa ubbas de7onne shempo; qasseka hara wursi immizayssa gidida gish izas paccizazi doonta gish izi asa kusheppe maado ekkenna.
Nu asa markateth ammanikko Xoossa markatethi hessafe adhees. Hessika izi ba naaza gish immida Xoossa markatetha.
Hessa aggidi Yesus Kirstoosa may7ite. Asho amo polanas qoppofte.
Isra7eele asay Iyarko gimbeza laapun qamma yuuyi yuuyi aadhdhidappe guye gimbeza ammanon laallides. *
Xoossi Phawuloosa baggara daro malalisiza malata ooththides.
Yesusikka istas “Ta intes tumu gays; nagara ooththizadey wuri nagaras aylle;
Ta ishato! Xoossi nuna hayssatho siiqikko nukka nu giddon siiqetanas bessees.
Ne de7o oge ta erana mala ooththadasa. Ne tanara diza gish ta ufayssay kumeththa’
Ta he baana gakkanaas qaala nababanas, zoranasinne tamarsanas minna.
Awa baggarakka nuna sugikkokka nuni tinth gi meqokko. Nuus yo7oy tippi giikkokka hidota qanxokko.
Bagga asay “Hayti daro woyne cajje uyida” giidi ista qidhida.
He ginbezi ginbettiday Iyasiphide geetettiza shuchchana. He katamayakka mastoote mala geeya uttida geeshsha worqafe oosetadus. *
Laapun boshata oykkida laapun kiitanchati Xoossa Keeththafe kezida. Isti qas geesh gididi xolqiza booththa may7o may7ida. Worqafe oosettida danco mala may7o tira bolla qachchida.
Intena qangizayta anjite attin qangofte. *
Iza tohoti tama bonqon qoxeti kezida xarqimala misatetes. Iza qaalaykka wolqama piissa haaththe giiriza mala giirees. *
Ne tana siiqida siiqoy istan gidana malanne takka istan gidana mala istikka nena erana mala ooththadis. Qasseka isti erana mala ooththana” gides.
Ba naazas mishetonta nu gish aaththi immiday iza. Histin ubba miish nuus izara kiyatethan wursi aazas imenee?
Isti “Wode wursethan Xoossa sheneppe haakkidayti barka ba iita amo kaallishe as qidhizayti yaana” giidi intes kase yooti woththida. *
heyta he meqqi wodhdhida haggata bolla otoretofa. Inte ista bolla otoretikko qasse hanno woznan woththite. He mitha tookkiday nena gidakka. Mithay nena tookkides attin.
Inte ammanon eqqida gish intena ufayssanas nu intenara ooththana attin inte ammano bolla godatanas gidenna.
Bitaaniya geetettizason Maaramanne Martay diza gutan Alazaare geetettizadey sakettides.
Hessa gish hayssa ha zoreza kadhidi ekkontadey Xillo Ayana izas immida Xoossa kadhees attin as kadhizade gidenna.
Inte Xoossa Ayana erana ogey “Yesus Kirstoosi asa asho may7idi yides” giza Ayanay wuri Xoossafeko!
Hessathoka heyti he asati barka ba agumo kaallidi barka ba asho tuniseetes. Bappe bollara dizaytas azazettettenna. Isti salon bonchora dizaytaka cayeettes.
Iita yo7oppe hakko, lo7o ooththo; saroteth koyonne kaallo.

Hessika hananay inte ammanon xaphidinne giigettidi inte inte ammanon ekkida mishiraachcho qaalappe qaaxonta minni eqqikkonna. Intessinne salo gufanthon diza medhetethas sabaketida Mishiraachcho qaalay hessa. Ta Phawuloossikka hayssa ha mishiraachcho qaalas oosancha gidadis.
Ayhudati heerakka iza caddanas wuri shuch denthida. Gido attin Yesusi ista matappe qotettidi Xoossa Keeththafe kezi bides.
Tumu xillotethaninne geeshshatethan Xoosse misatana medhetida ooratha asateth may7ite. *
Xoossa azazo naagizaytappenne Yesusa ammanon minnida geeshshatappe koyettiza dandayay haninko.
Gido attin Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthides.
“Ta lo7o heemmizade; lo7o heemmizadey ba shempo ba dorsata gish aaththi imees.
Ta intena go7ana mala Xoossi kiyatethan taas oosos exxa immidayssa inte tumappe siyideta.
Asa giddon shaakoteth medhiza as issito nam7uto ne zorin ekkonta ixikko izaadera nees issifetethi dooppo.
Hessa he qaalappe dendidayssan Ayhudata giddon qasseka shaaketethi medhetides.
Iza markateth ekkizadey gidikko Xoossa tumancha gididayssa qoncisees.
Hessa gish ta siiqoto! Hessi wurikka hanana gallas inte naagishe diikko Goday intena inte bolla boroy baynda dishin sarotethan demmana mala minni diite.
Wursethan ta ishato! Qasseka Goda qaalay inte achchan hanoyssathoka eleeli ubbaso gakkana malanne bonchettana mala nuus woossite.
Gaasoyka Goda Yesus Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthidayssi nunakka izara issife denthidi intenara ba sinth shiishanayssa nu eroos.
Inte giddon saketiza asi dizee? diikko Woosa Keeththa cimata xeeygo. Istika Goda sunthan zayte iza bolla tiydi izas woosseto. *
“Muse laythi oyddu tammu gidida wode Musey ba ishata Isra7eele nayta beyanas ba woznan qoppides. *
Hayssa addeza Ayhuda asati oykki wodhana gishin izi Oroome asi gididayssa ta gakka erida gish wotadaratara gakkada ashshadis.

Heerakka kumeththa katamay shirotides; dereyka wuri issi bolla gididi Maqidooniya asa gididaytanne Phawuloosara issife yuuyiza iza laggeta Gayiyoosanne Arisxirokoosa oykkidi derey kase ka7izaso wothan gelida.
Geeshshanne xilloza inte kadidi shempo wodhizayssi birshettana mala woossideta. *
Ista woznakka ammanon geeshshidi nu giddoninne ista giddon aykko shaakkokka ooththibenna.
Oonikka hayssa ha uketha mannappenne ushshafe uyanappe kaseti barka bana paaco.
Hessa gish ta siiqo ishato! Minni eqite. Ay miishanka yark yarkofte. Goda oosos inte daaburiza daabursay hada gidontayssa eridi ubba wode pacey baynda Godas ooththanas minetite.
Hessa gish inte tana misatana mala ta intena woossays.
Xoossa eratethafe dendidayssan alamey ba eratetha gaason Xoossa eroy xoonin sabako eeyateththan ammanizayta ashshanas Xoossa shene gidides.
Hessathoka macheto! Inte inte azinatas azazetite. Hessatho issi issi azinati Xoossa qaala ammanontayta gidikkokka coo mela ba macheta lo7etethan xalala simmonta aggettenna. *
Xoossi nu baggara as xeygiza gish nuni qasse Kirstoosa ogathata. Hessa gish “Inte Xoossara maqaynite!” giidi nu intena Kirstoosa sunthan woossos.
Gido attin Xoossi iza bollafe hayqo wolqa diggidi hayqoppe denthides. Hayqoyka iza oykki ashshanas dandaybenna. *
Intenan xeeygetida boncho Xoossa suntha zigirzayti ista gidettennee?
Mathotontade, oosh oyeetontade, qas maarage as, asara palametontade, miish goodontadde, gidanas bessees.
Ta immiza haaththe uyizadey gidikko mernas mulekka saamotenna. Gaasoyka ta immiza haaththe uyizades merna de7os pultiza pulto haaththe gidana” gides.
Qasse oonikka iza qaala naagikko tumu Xoossa siiqoy izaden poletides. Nuni izan dizayssa erizay hessanna.
He daweza duunappenne he do7aza duunappe, wordo nabeza duunappe oqars misatiza heedzdzu tuna ayanati kezishin ta beyadis.
Maxaafan “Ne lagge ne hu7e mala siiqa” geetetti xaafetida kawo woga inte polikko lo7o ooththeta.
Nuni Yesus Kirstoosi Goda gididayssa sabakoos attin nuna sabakkokko. Nuka nu baggara Yesusa gish intes ooththizadenta gididos.
Inte balettofte! Iita laggetethi lo7o amalera dizayta moores.
Dorsata henthanchay wogga Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ba merna caaqo qaala suuthan iza hayqoppe denthida sarotetha Xoossi,

Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaalas bessiza mala diite. Hessatho hanka ta intena hee baada beydakko woykko hahon daada inte gish ta siyizakko inte Mishiraachcho qaala ammanos issino oletishe issi Ayanan inte minni eqnayssa ta erays.
Xoossi Goda hayqoppe denthida mala nunakka qasse izi ba wolqan hayqoppe denthana.
Hessa gish tani ta kushe ne bolla woththin ne ekkidayssa ne bolla diza Xoossa imota ne dentheththana mala ta nena qofissays.
Hayqqidaytassara Mishiraachcho qaalay yootetiday hessa gishassa. Hessathoka ay asa bollaka pirdiza mala ista asho bolla pirdana. Ista shempoy qas Xoossi diza mala de7on deyana.
Inte miishan shametideta. Hessa gish asa aylle gidoppite.
Ista garsafe issi issi asati zuuzumetidi dhaysiza bosha kiitanchan dhayidayssatho inteka dhayonta mala zuuzumoppite. *
Nuni Wodhe demmanas giidi Xoossa qaala shaqaca mala walakerethidi bayziza daro asata mala gidokko. Gido attin Xoossafe kiitettida suure asa mala gididi Kirstoosan Xoossa sinthan suure yootos.
Nuni ammanon minnidayti hanko ammanon minnotayta meto tookkanas bessees attin nu xalla ufayetizayta gidanas bessenna.
Takka inteko mata wode baanayssa Godan ammanettays.

Hessafe guye oyddu kiitanchata biitta bolla oyddu baggara eqqidayta beyadis. Istika biitta bolla gidin woykko abba bolla woykko mitha bolla ay carkoyka carkonta mala oyddu baggara yiza bosha carko wursi oykkida. *

Hinko dere asati ooththizayssa mala inte coo mela yeda duussan asho amon, mathon, ogey baynda kaassan, wogappe aaththi uyidi durusaninne harassiza eeqa goynnon kase inte aaththida wodezi intes gidana.
Oonikka ista qohanas koykko ista duunappe tamay kezidi ista morketa xuugana. Ista qohana koyizadenti wuri hayqqanay hessa malana.
Phawuloosikka istas “Ta ishato! Izi Qeeseta halaqa gididayssa ta erabeykke. gaasoyka ‘Ne dere halaqa bolla iita qaala gooppa’ gizayssi xaafetides” gides. *
Kana mala coo hothu hothizayti bita bitizayti, laymatizayti, shempo wodhizayti, eeqas goynnizayti, wordo siiqizaytinne wordo ooththizayti wurikka he katamayppe karen attana.

Gidikkoka ta nena kadhiza issi miishi ne bolla dees. Hessika Bala7ame timirte oykkida issi issi asati inte giddon deettes. Hessi Bala7amey Isra7eele asay eeqas yarshettida kath miidinne layma laymatidi dhuphettana mala Baalaqe zoridade. *
Ta ishato! Inte ammanoy wodeppe woden dicci dicci biza gishshinne inte siiqoyka kaseppe gujeti gujeti biza gish nu inte gish Xoossa lo7ethi galatanas bessees.
Inte ammananappe kase coo mela yaanne haanne guussan inte eronta kaalethettidi duuna duude gidida eeqatakko bidayssa inteka ereeta.
Azinato! Kirstoosi Woossa Keeththayo siiqida malanne bana izi gish aaththi immida mala inteka inte macheta siiqite. *
Oonaska iita gish iita zaaroppite. Asa ubba achchan lo7o miish ooththanas minnite.
Hessa gish Xoossi ba woden dhoqu histana mala mino Xoossa kusheppe garsara intena ziqqi histite. *
Gido attin Xoossi saloppe iranne hessaththokka kaththi kaxxiza wodeta immidi inte wozna kaththaninne ufayssa kunthides; ufayssaka intena kalthidi lo7o ooson bana markay baynda aggibenna” gida.
Maca daaqonetikka bonchettidayta, zigirontayta, qas wogara dizayta, hano ubban ammanetidayta gidanas bessees.
Iza maarotethan gelana mala ta izis wode immadisshin, iza qas ba laymatethafe simmanas koyabeykku.

Herdoosikka Xiroose asaranne Sidoona asara oosha. He dere asay kath demmizay Herodossa dereppe gidida gish he dere kawo xeellizade Bilasxoosappe maado qaala demmida mala issi bolla gididi Herdoosara maqaynthanas oychida.
Yesusi istas “Tani ta Aawa bonchays attin daydanthi ta bolla baawa. Inte gidikko tana kawushsheeta.
Wolqama carkoy carkiza gish abbay keehi qaaxides.
Ha7i nu ekiza waayey buro nuus sinthan giigi uttida bonchozara gaththi xeellishin aykkokka gidenna gays.
Ta nayto! Inte nagaray Yesus Kirstoosappe dendidayssan atto geetettida gish ta intes xaafays.

Nu aykkokka ooththida gish gidonta dishin ba qofa malanne ba kiyatetha mala nuna ashshidaynne nuna erays dummasidi izi xeygides. He iza kiyatethay merna wodeppe kase Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus imettides.
Qeeseta halaqatinne ista ashkarati Yesusa beyidi “Ne iza kaqqa! Kaqqa!” gishe waassida. Philaxoosi qasse “Ta ta baggara iza bolla issi mooroka demmabekke; koykko inte efidi kaqqite” gides.
He atotethaza gish intes imettana kiyatethas kase nabeti lo7ethi woznappe pilgi xeellida.
Yesus Kirstoosi asa asho may7idi yibenna giza ammanonta daro baleththizayti alame bolla laalettida. Heyta malay ay asikka as baleththizadenne Kirstoosara eqetizade.
“Hayssi addezi nuus iita harge gidides; alamen diza Ayhudata ubba bolla meto medhees, Naaziraawe geetettiza wordo asata waanna kaalethizadey izakko.

Tumu Ayana duussa xuuray sidhey baynda gita; izikka “Ase gidides; iza Xillotethi Xillo Ayanan qoncides; kiitanchatas beettides; dere ubbas sabaketides; alamen dizaytan ammanettides; bonchora pude dendi bides” gizayssa.
Issi issi shachchi oyddu tammanne ichashu kilo gidiza shachchi saloppe duge asa bolla wodhdhides. Bochazi daro iita gidida gish asay he shachcha bosha geedon Xoossa cayides. *
Gido attin nuni izi nuus immida hidota mala xillotetha oosoy oosetizaso ooratha salonne ooratha biitta naagos. *
Saloykka waraqata mala xaaxettidi kichchides. Zumatinne abba giddon diza gadeti wurikka ba dizasoppe dhayichida. *
Hayssa ha “Iza shene” giza qaala mala hara yarsho zaarethi shiishshanaas koshshonta mala Yesus Kirstoosa baggara issito shiiqida yarshon geeyidos.
Nu intena nu woossan qoppishe ubba wode Xoossa inte gish galatoos.

Qasseka hara xeeqa zo7o paray kezides. He para togidadey biitta bollafe saroteth dhayssana malanne asay ba garsan issoy issa wursana mala ooththisanas izas godatethinne wogga gita mashshay imettides. *
Xoossa sunthinne iza timirtey cayettonta mala aylletetha qambara giddon dizayti wuri ba godas kumeththa bonchoy bessizayssa eretto.
Kase ceega asateth iza oosora gaththi intefe qaari yeggida gish inte inte garsan issoy issara wordo hasayoppite. *

Gido attin ta nena kadhiza miishi dees. Hessika bana ‘Ta nabe’ giza macasayo Elizabeelo neni bessa aggida gish iza taas ooththizayti layma laymatana malanne eeqas yarshetida kath maana mala iza tamarsada baleththadus. *
Ayzaabey ammanon attanayssa eridi Xoossi kase Geeshsha Maxaafan “Derey wuri ne baggara anjettana” giidi Mishiraachcho qaala Abrahaames yooti woththides. *
Inte Xoossa nayta gidi uttidi qaalay gizayssa balideta. “Ta naazo Xoossa seera kawushshan xeellofa; nena izi seeriza wode hidota qanxofa.

Intena kaalethizaytas azazetitenne haarettite. Hessas gaasoyka inte gish ista alafetethan daro oychiza guday diza gish inte shempo gish daro baaxetetes. Hessa gish isti ba ooththiza oosoza lancettishe gidonta ufayssan ooththana mala inte istas azazetite. Inte hessatho histonta aggikko intes lo7enna.
Kanaane biittan dizayta laapun kawota dhayssidi ista biitta ba deretas gade histi laattissides. *
Oonikka wordo timirte tamarsko Goda Yesus Kirstoosa lo7o qaalanne Ayana tumatetha minisiza timirtera gaaggontayssa gidikko,
Oonikka inteko yishe hessa he timirteza ekki yoonta as mokki ekoftenne saroka gooppite.
Kirstoosa waayey nu bolla daridayssa mala nuuska Kirstoosa baggara minthethoy darees.
Isti Qayeele ogen bida gish miishas giidi Bala7ame mala balan kundida. Qasse Qoorey eqettida mala istika eqettidi dhayida gish istas aayye-ana! *
Hayti asati qasse istas eretonta ixida miish wursi cash cayeettes. Aykkokka eronta meheta mala coo mela qoppi ekkida miishi istas diikko isti hessan dhayana.

Nohes Xoossi buro Nohey ba ayfen beyonta miisha gish naagettana mala yootin Nohey Xoossa babbidi baso asa ashshanas ammanon markabe keexxidi alame asa pirdisides; ammanon beettiza xilloteth laattizade gidides. *
Wurikka hessatho giigetidappe guye Qeeseti ba ooso polanas dunkanas koyro kifile geletes. *
“Inteno wozna muumeto! Haytha tulleto! Inteka inte aawata mala ubba wode Xillo Ayanara eqetteta. *

Qasseka wogay imettiday xillo asas gidonta woga yedhi aadhdhizaytas, azazettontaytas, Xoossas babbontaytas, nagaranchatas, geeshshatethi bayndaytas, Xoosse leeqqizaytas, ba aayonne ba aawa wodhizaytasinne shempo wodhizaytas gididayssa nu eroos.
Intes laymatiza asatara issifetethi doonta mala ta intes kase dabdaabe xaafadiskoshin.
Gido attin kase koyro tani ta aayi ulon dishin baasi dooridi ba kiyatethan tana xeygida Xoossay
Tani ta ooththizayssa erike. Ta ooththana koyizayssa ooththa erike shin ta ixiza miish ooththays. *
Hessafe bollara nu Godanne nu dhale Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethaninne iza shaakki eron pude diccite. Izas ha7ikka mernaska bonchoy gido. Amiin.
Nu Kirstoosa gish eeyata gididos. Inte qas Kirstoosan eranchata; nuni daburanchata; inte gidikko minota; inte bonchettidayta; nuni gidikko kawushshata.
Alame kumeththan diza inte ishati hessa mala meto ekkana dizayssa inte eridi ammanon minni eqqidi izara eqetite.
Aylleto! As ufayssasinne coo ayfeson betanas gidonta suure woznappe inte Godas babbite. Hayssa biittan haariza godataska hano ubban azazetite. *
“Ne beyida tammu kaceti buro kawotonta tammu kawota. Gidikkoka isti he do7azara issife issi saates do7azara kawotanas kawoteththa wolqa demmana. *
Xoossafe nuus imettidayssa nuni erana mala Xoossa Ayanay nuus imettides attin nuni hayssa ha alameza ayana ekibeekko.
Histikko inteno dure asato! Ane siyite. Buro inte bolla gakkana metoza gish yeekkite; wuu wuy! gi waassite.

Buro sinthafe ne bolla gakkana metos babbofa. Inte paacettana mala intefe issi issi as dabuloosi qasho keeththe gelthana. Tammu gallas gakkanaas inte waaye beyanashin ne hayqqana gakkanaas ammanettidade gida. Tani nees merna de7o aklile hista immana.
Neno Xoossa aso! Ne hessa ubbafe baqata. Xilloteth, Tumu Ayanan duus, ammano, siiqo, dandayanne ashketeth kaalla.
Inte biitta bolla ishalonne al7etethan de7ideta, inte wozna shukas dhiikkida mehe mala modhisideta.
Hessathoka he algaza yuuyi aadhdhida nam7u tammanne oyddu algati deettes. He algata bolla qas booththa may7o may7idi ba hu7e bolla worqa aklile woththida nam7u tammanne oyddu cimati uttida.

Iza baas, ba bonchossinne baas giigana mala immoyssa gina waayenne muuzoteth izis immite; iza ba woznara ‘Tani kawo machi mala uttadis attin am7i mala gidikke. Tana muuzotethi mulekka gakkenna’ gaada ceeqqettawus.

Azinato! Inte inte machetara akeekan issife de7ite. Isti intefe daburancha medheteth gidida gishshinne qasseka Xoossi coo mela kiyatethan immiza de7o isti intenara issife laattanayssa gish inte ista bonchite. Inte heyssatho ooththikko inte woossa dhuphiza miishi deenna. *
Macassi co7u gaanappe attin iza tamarsana mala woykko adde bolla godatana mala ta koyikke.
Izi ba naaza nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa issifetethako intena xeygida Xoossi izi ammanettida Xoossa.
Ta ishato! Inte geeshshatethas xeeygetideta; inte inte geeshshatetha zaaridi intes asho amo polanas go7ettofte. Hessafe inte inte garsan siiqon issoy issa maaddite.
Inte haasaya haasayishe woykko issi miish ooththishe intena xillisiza asa mala gidite.
Oosoykka dumma dumma gidishin Goday gidikko issino.
Kase Aawatikka ista bagga Kirstoosi ista zeretha zarken qoodetes. Izikka ubbafe bolla gidida mernas galattettida Xoossa. Amiin.
Nu meton inte atotethinne minoteth demmeeta. Nuni metotishin qasse inteka kase ekkida metoza mala genci ekkidi minettandeta.
Hessa gish inteka nunikka Kirstoosan minni eqana malanne ba oosos dooriday Xoossa.
He kase qaalay qasseka nam7antho izakko yiidi “Xoossi geeshshidayssa ne tuna mala qoodoppa” gides.
Izira laymatishe ishalo duus deyida ha biitta kawoti iza xuugetishin cuwattiza cuwa beyidi izi gish waassidi yeekkana.
Yesusikka izas “Tana siiqizadey ta qaala naagana; ta Aawayka iza dosana; nuni izakko yaana; yiidikka izaadera issife daana.
Nuni Xoosse siiqibeykko shin izi nuna siiqides. Nu nagara dhayssana mala ba naaza yeddides. Siiqo guusikka hessa.
Gido attin izi poo7on diza mala nukka poo7on simeretikko nu garsan nuus issifetethi dees; iza naa Yesus Kirstoosa suuthi nuna nagara ubbafe geeshshees.
Hessa gish hayssafe guye ne naappe attin aylle gidakka. Neni naa gidida gish Xoossi nena bayssa laattizade histides.
Naaza gish qasse “Godo! Ne zufaney mernappe merna gakkanaas minni daana. Neni ne kawoteththa likke kaaleththasa.
Ayuhudatikka “Nu nena shuchchara caddizay ne coo as gida uttada nena nerka Xoosse kessada cashsha qaala ne haasayida gishassafe attin ne lo7o ooththidaysa gish deenna” giidi izas zaarida.

Isti izan xuugetiza tamappe keziza cuwazi merpe mernas pude kezishe daana. He do7azassinne iza misilezas goynnizayti woykko iza sunthaa malataa ba bolla woththidayti wurikka wontanne qamman istas shempoy deenna.” *
Xoossa maarotetha daroppe dendidayssan hayssi ha oosozi nuus diza gish nuni hidota qanxokko.
Hessa gish kumeththa woznappe nuni “Goday taas maado; ta babbike. Tana asi ay ooththana dandayizee?” goos. *
Bettidayssa wursi mizadey wursi moontade kadhoppa. Moontadey qasse mizade bolla pirdofo. Xoossi ubbakka ekides.
Minotethinne dandaya immiza Xoossi inte Yesus Kirstoosa kaallishin intes inte giddon Ayana issifeteth immo.

Izi hanko Qeeseta halaqata mala koyro ba nagara gish qasseka kaaleththidi hanko dereza nagara gish gallas gallas yarsho shiishshanaas iza koshshenna. Izi bana aaththi immida wode asa nagara gish issito sintha baggassara yarsho wursi polides.*
Miishi dizadey oonikka ba ishay waayetishin beyidi izas mishetonta agikko Xoossa siiqoy izan waani danee?
Nuni ashoppe shaaketidi Godara duus dooranayssa ta sidhonta yootays.
Ta siiqoto! Inte hayssa alameza bolla imathenne bete as gidida gish shempora olettiza asho amotethatappe haakkana mala ta intena hadara gays.
As ubbakka bonchite. Ammanizayta siiqite. Xoossas babbite. Kawo bonchite.
Muses Xoossi iza kushen ista wozanayssa iza asay akeekkiza misatides. Gido attin isti hessa yuushi qoppibetenna.
Heyta kana mala huskatizaytappe, iita ooththizaytappenne asas meqeth menthiza asataappe naagetite.
Isti bana nu Xoosse eroos geettes shin ba hanotethan gidikko kadetes. Isti shuunizayta, azazetontaytanne lo7o oosos besontayta.
Isti Xoossa yo7os mishetizayta gididayssa ta ista gish markattana dandayays; ista mishetethi gidikko eratethan gidenna.
Nuka nu baggara Xoossafe demmida minotethan metotetizayta minthethanas dandayana mala nu meton izi nuna minthethes.
Tumu Xoossa qaala yootizade, yeellachonta oosanchanne asi ne gish lo7o markattizade gidada nenateth wursa Xoossa sinth shiishshanas minna.
Izikka Xoosse geetetti gooynettiza eeqa xoossata ubbafe bollara bana dhoqu dhoqu histizadenne Xoossara eqettizade. Izikka Xoossa Keeththan uttidi bana “Tani Xoossa” giidi awajja awajjisana. *
Yelidayto! Inteka inte nayta hanqeethofte; gido attin inte nayta Goda zoreninne seeran dichchite. *
Nuna aazika izappe shaakenna. Hayssa ubban nuna siiqidayssan xoonizaytappekka nu aadhdhos.
Nu wurikka biitta bolla kundi dishin Ayhudata qaalara ‘Sawule! Sawule! Tana aazas goodday? Neni qara mashsha bolla eqqiikko nerka nena qohassa’ giza qaala siyadis.
Tani ne waayezanne ne manqotetha erays. Gidikkoka neni dureko. Ayhuda gidonta dishe bana nuni Ayhudakko giza Xala7e maabara gididayti heyti ne sunth mooroyssa ta erays.
Siiqoy tumanppe attin makalan ufayetenna.
Hessa gish tunatethinne dalgida iitateth intefe kessi yeggidi inte shempo ashshanas dandayiza inte giddon tokketida qaala ashketethara ekkite.
Ta tokkadis; Aphiloossi haaththe ushshides; dichchiday gidikko Xoossa. *
Hara nam7antho kiitanchay qas “Dereza wursa mathosiza layma woyne cajje ushshida macasaya hinnaka wogga gita Babiloona kundadus! Kundadus!” gishe koyro kiitanchaza kaallides. *
Ta Intena azazizayssa ubba inte polikko inte ta laggeta.
Nayto! Intenatetha eeqatappe naagite.
Heytanti issi issi keeththe kalxi gelidi daro deexo nagaraninne dumma dumma iita amotetha gars gelidi heene ha qaaxiza ammanon laafa macasata qaxi oykettes.
Hessatho hano aggidi tuma siiqon haasayishe hu7e gididayssakko hanizazan ubban ane diccoos. He hu7ezika Kirstoosa.
Saroteth immiza Ayana issifeteth naaganas minnite.
Sawuleyka “Godo! Ne oonee?” gides. Izikka izas “Tani ne goodeththiza Yesusakko!” *†
Goda Kirstoosa inte woznan bonchitenne iza inte de7os Goda histite. Intes diza hidota gish intena oychizaytas ubbas zaaro immanas ubba wode giigeti uttite.

“Godayka izas ‘Hayssi ne eqqidasoy geeshshaso gidida gish ne tohoppe caamma shodda. Gibxen diza ta dereta waaye ta tumappe beyadis; isti waassiza waaye waasoza ta siyada ista ashshanas wodhdhadis. Ne ha7ikka haaya; ta nena duge Gibxe zaarada kiitana’ gides.
Inte koyro siyida qaalaya intenan du; inte koyro siyidara intenan diikko inteka Naazanne Aawan daana.
Ta intes tumu gays; oonikka ta qaala naagikko hayqo mulekka hayqqenna” gi zaarides.
Hessafe guye issi gita booththa alganne he alga bolla uttidayssa beyadis; biittaynne saloy iza sinthafe baqatida shin isti biidi gelanasoy beettibenna. *
Qasse Kaththi ulossa; uloykka kathassa; gido attin Xoossi nam7aakka dhayssana; asatethi Godasfe attin laymas gidenna. Godayka asaatethassa.
Hessathoka inte nagaras hayqqidi Xoossas Yesus Kirstoosa baggara paxa dizayssa erite.
Gido attin Kirstoosa baggara ubba wode nuna xoono ogen kaalethi yuushizanne ba lo7o eratetha nu baggara ubba soon qoncisiza Godas galatay gakko.
Nu izappe siydi intes yootiza kiitay “Xoossi poo7o; iza achchan mulekka dhumay deenna” gizayssa.
Ta Aaway taas immizay wurikka taakko yaana. Taakko yizade ta gede kare goodikke.
Inte inte giddon ishata mala dosettite.
Hessa gish izi ista giigissana gaannatishe ubba wode hayqqonta paxa eqqi diza gish iza baggara Xoossako yizayta wursi ashshanas dandayees.
Gido attin isti qas “Gede digga! Gede digga! Kaqqa!” gishe waassida. Philaxoosika “Ta inte kawo kaqqoo?” gides. Qeeseta halaqati zaaridi “Nuus Qeesareppe hara kawoy deenna” gida.
Hessa malaka ha7i ha wodezanka Xoossa kiyatethan Isra7eele asappe dooretti attida guuthati deettes.
Biitta bolla diza kawoti wurikka izira laymatida. Biitta bolla diza asaykka izi laymatetha woyne cajjen mathottides” gides. *
Inte inte garsan issoy issara ishata mala lo7ethi siiqetite. Issoy issa bappe aaththi bonchizayta gidite.
Xoossa Ayanan kaallizayti isti Xoossa nayta.
Hessathoka hara malatay salo bolla beettides. Izas laapun hu7eynne tammu kaceti diza issi gita dawey beettides. Iza hu7eta bollaka laapun zawudeti deettes. *
Nuni Xoossa nayta gidikko iza laattizayta. Nu Kirstoosa bonchoza laattizayta gidana mala addafekka izara iza metoza gishettizayta gidikko nu Xoosse laattizayta; Kirstoosarakka issife laattizayta.
Woossa keeththa lo7ethi ayssizayti harappeka sabakkoninne tamarson minniza cimati gidikko dakko maado maadettanas bessees.
Gido attin hessa asi wuri erenna. Issi issi asati hanno gakkanaas eeqa goynno dosida gish hessa mala asho miishe addaka Eeqas shukettidayssa qoppeetes. Istas qofay laafa gidida gish isti tuneetes.
Ta bolla dishe ayfe immonta hagga wursi ta Aaway qanxi diggana; ayfiza hagga gujji ayfana mala qirxi geeshshana.
Hessathoka inte alafetetha garsan dizayta yedhi haaron gidonta wudezas lo7o leemiso besson gido.
Ta ishato! Inte ashon hayqqidayta gish eronta attana mala nu koyokko. Qasseka hidotay baynda hara asata mala inte kayottana mala nu koyokko.
Isra7eele asay mela biitta bolla hamuttiza mala Zo7o Abba giddora ammanon pinnides. Gibxe asay qasse istatho hanana gish abban mitetides. *
He wode Musey yeletides. Izikka Xoossa achchan dosettida mala lo7o naa gidides. Ba aawa keeththan heedzdzu agina al7isson diccides. *
Izikka ba baggara daburancha gidida gish eronta asatasinne oge balidaytas qadhettana dandayees.
Qamay aadhdhin wontana gees. Hessa gish ane nu dhuma ooso wora yeggidi poo7o ola miishi may7os.

Inteno godato! Inteka inte ooththisizaytas hessatho ooththite. Istasinne intes Goda gididay bolla salon dizayssa; izikka as ayfeso xeelli maadontayssakka inteka eriiza gish oosanchata babiso aggidi lo7o ooththite. *
Ufayetizaytara ufayetite; muuzotizaytara muuzotite.
Gido attin neni ne wozna muumetethaninne maaroteth koyonta ne wozna geedon tuma Xoossa pirday qonciza wode Xoossa hanqo gallassas ne bolla daro hanqo shiishasa.
Ayhudati qas Anxokiyappenne Iqoniyooneppe yida asay asa zoridi Phawuloosa shuchchan caddana mala ammanthida. Phawuloosakka shuchchan caddidinne hayqqides gi goochchidi katamappe gede kare kessida.
Yesusi hessa gi simmidi keehi qofan gelidinne “Ta intes tumu gays; inte giddofe issadey tana aaththi immana” giidi qoncen yootides.
Qasse Geeshsha Maxaafay hayssi alamey wurikka nagaran qashetidayssa awajjes. Hessika asi wurikka Yesus Kirstoosa ammanon beettiza hidotay ammanizaytas ubbas imettanassa.
Isti ba markatetha wursidappe guye hirki ciimma ollafe keziza do7ay istara olettidi ista Xoonananne wodhana. *
Nuus kase koyroppe diza ammano nuni wurseth gakkanaas lo7ethi minthi oykikko nuni Kirstoosara issife laattana.
Kirstoosi inte giddon diikko qasse inte asatethay nagara geedon hayqeth gidikkoka inte Ayanay qasse xillotetha gaason de7on dees.
Nabetappe inte Aawati gooddonta nabey oonee? Xilloza Yohannisa kaseti yootida nabetaka wodhida; inteka ha7i iza aaththi immidetanne wodhideta.
qanateteth, mathoteth, alame yeth yexethinne heytanta misatizayta. Tani intes kase yootida mala ha7ikka inte naagettana mala qofisays. Hessa mala duus dizayti wurikka Xoossa kawoteth laatetenna.
Inte poo7o nayta gidana mala poo7oy dishin poo7on ammanite” gides. Yesusi hessa gidappe guye biidi ista ayfeppe geemmides.
Musey Xoossa Keeththa ubba bolla ammanettidade gidida mala Yesusikka bana shuumidades ammanettidade.
Hessaka Xillo Ayanay nu bolla nu Goda Xoossi nuna ashshida Yesus Kirstoosa baggara darsi gussides.
Qophiroose geetettizason diza Yoosefe geetettizadey issi Lewe bagga asi dees. Izikka Hawaaretan “Barnabaasa” geetetti summides. Hessas birsheththay “Minthetho naa” guussa.
Ane nu lo7o ooso ooththanas azallokko; nu ufaysi qanxonta agikko wodey gakkishin gakkida kath nu maxana.
Tani Xoossas daana mala woga baggara he wogas hayqqadis.
Hessafe guye ta izara wadha wadhdhanas guufe misatiza shomboqoy taas imettides. Taas hizgetides “Neni dendada Xoossa Keeththazanne giddo kifileta wadhdha! Heen goynnizayata tayba. *
Heyti machontayta gidida gish isti macara aqidi tunbetenna. Isti dorsay bizaso iza kaallettes. Isti Xoossassinne iza dorsazas asa garsafe xeera kaththa mala shiiqidayta.
Booleti qas olas giigettida parata misateetes; istas hu7e bolla worqa aklile misatiza miishi dees. Ista ayfesoy asa ayfeso misatees. *
Inte Xoossas ooththiza asata mala gididi hirgay baynda de7ite attin inte inte shene mala diza duussa iitatetha kammiza miish histofte.
Nu hessas giidi dafettossinne daaburos. Hessika asa ubbas harappeka ammanizaytas ashshiza de7o Xoossan nu hidota ooththiza gishassa. *
Histin Xoossa naa kadhida asi izan geeyida caaqo suutha hiraaysso miisha mala qoodidadessinne iza kiyatetha Ayana isethidades ay mala hessafe aadhdhiza pirday izas bessiza intes misatizee? *
Hessafe guye qasseka Yesusi ista “Intes saroy gido! Ta Aaway tana kiittida mala takka intena kiittays” gides.
Heyti he asati ubba wode zuuzumetizaytanne ay miishanka ufayeti erontayta. Isti ba iita amo kaallizayta; ista duunan otoretetha qaalay kumides. Baas ba go7a koyishe as addasheettes.
Biitta bolla diza kawoti biitta haarizayti, ola halaqati, dureti, wolqamati, ashkaratinne godati wurikka gongolo giddoninne zumata garsan zaallata garsan qotetida. *

Gido attin hanko baboti, istas ammanetontayti, tunati, asa shempo wodhizayti, laymatizayti, bitizayti, eeqas goynnizayti, wordotizayti, heyta ubbata qaaday diinen exxiza tama abba giddon gidana. Hessika nam7antho hayqo” gides.
Histin ha7i aazas gam7ay? Dendada iza sunth xeeygada xammaqeta; ne nagarappekka meeceta’ gides.
Ista hu7e ithikey macasa hu7e isike misatees; ista achchey qas gaammo achche misatees. *
Goda oosanchay asara oyeetanas bessenna. Hessafe asa ubba achchan kiya, as tamarsanas dandayizadenne mino as gidanas bessees.
Ta intefe asho ayfen haakka diikkokka Ayanan intenara issife days. Inte wogara dizayssanne inte Kirstoosa lo7eth ammanizayssa beyada ta daro ufayetays.
Goda ayfeti xillota bagga xeelletes. Iza haythetika ista woossa siyanas doya deettes. Hinko iita ooththizayta qas Goday ba hanqo ayfeso bessana” gides.

Godan dosettida ta ishato! Nu gidikko ubba wode inte gish Xoosse galatanas nuus besses. Gaasoyka Xoossi intena koyroppe oykkidi inte Xillo Ayanan dummatidaytanne tumu ammanidi inte attana mala intena doorides.
Hayssafe guye makalzay gujji makalo, tunaykka tuno, xilloykka xilli kaallo, geeshshayka geeyo” gides
Phexroosikka “Maarotethan gelite; inte nagaray maarettana mala intefe issi issi asi Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan xammaqettite; izi immiza Xillo Ayana inte ekkana.
Oonaska iita gish iita zaaronta mala naagetite; gido attin inte inte giddon gidin hara asara gidin ubba wode lo7o gidizayssa ooththanas baaxetite.

Hessathoka attuma asay baasi bessiza macasatara zin7anas bessishin addey addera zin7anas amon xuugetidi macasatara zin7iza mala addey addera zin7idi pala miishi ooththida. Heytanti barka ba ooththida iita oosozas bessiza qixaate ba bolla ehida.
Hessathoka inte intes ufayetidi tanaka ufayssanas bessees.
Hessa gish inte nagaray qucceti dhayana mala maarotethan gelite. Inte biza ogeppe simmite; Goda matappe inte ooraxana wodey intes yaana.
He Katamayn qamay baynda gish izi pengeti ay wodekka gordettettenna.
Ta asho mizadessinne ta suuth uyizades ubbas merna de7oy dees. Takka izaade wursetha gallas hayqoppe denthana.
Yesusikka izas zaaridi “Sheney nees Xoossafe imettontako nees ta bolla ay godateththika deennashin; gido attin tana nees aaththi immidade bolla gita nagaray dees” gides.
Hessathoka oosoy baynda ammanoyka baas hayqqidayssa.
Nagarancha ashoppe dendidayssan wogay polanas dandayontayssa Xoossi ba naaza nagarancha asa leemison nagaras yarshettana mala yeddidi polides. Histidi nagara iza ashon pirdides.
Inte lo7o ooththida gish waaye be7ikkoka inte anjo ekkana. Asay inte bolla iita ooththanas mandetizayssas babbofitenne daro qoppofte. *
Aawato! Nayti hidota qanxonta mala inte nayta hanqethofte. *

Izi qas dhoqa qaalan “Gita Babiloona kundadus! Kundadus! kundadus! Daydantha duussa so gidadus! Tuna ayanatas aqoso gidadus! Harassiza iita kafotas shemposo, iitanne harassiza do7atasikka aqoso gidadus. *
Yesusa izi Kirstoosa gidenna gi kaadizadefe hara wordanchay oonee? Hessadey Aawanne Naaza kadiza Kirstoosara eqetizade.
Hessa gish oonikka bessonta dishin hayssa uketha miikko woykko Goda ushsha uyikko izaadey Goda ashonne iza suutha kawushshida gish izi oyshettana.
Neno eeyazo! Oosoy baynda ammanos go7ay bayndayssa eranas marka koyay?

Hessa gish Yuhuday wotadarata, Qeeseta halaqatanne Farsaaweetappe kiitetti yida ashkarata wursi kaalethi ekkidi he isti shiiqizaso yides. Izara yida asay paanose, xompe, mashshanne toora oykkidi yides.
Goday gidikko ammanettidayssa. Izikka intena minthana; Xala7epaka intena naagana.
Izi gede wora yegetida wode kawo Paaroone maca naya demmada baas ekkadus. Ba naa mala ooththada dichchadus. *

Hessafe guye kiitanchazi exaane izan cuwasizayssa oykkidi yarsho yarshizasozappe tama ekki izan kunthidi duge biitta bolla yeggides. Daday dadatides; giirsi giirdes; wolqanthi wolqamides; biittaykka qaaxides. *

Dere asaa wursa mathosiza ba laymatethaa woyne cajjeza ushshadus. Biitta bolla diza kawoti izira laymatida. Biitta bolla diza zal7anchati izis diza ishalo duussafe dendidayssan daro duretida” gi waassides *
Hessa gaason Ayhudati ta Xoossa Keeththan dishin tana oykkidi wodhana koyda.
Tuma siyanappe ba hayth haraso zaaridi hayssi7e bagga simmana.

Gido attin inte giddon issi issi ammanonta asati deettes” gides. Yesusi istas hessa giday koyroppe doommidi ista giddon ammanontayti oonantakkonne qasse iza aaththi immanaddeyka oonakkone eriza gishassa.
Yesusikka zaaridi “Izaadey ta ha7i budena woxen dhim7ada barsizadde” gides. Hessa gi simmidi budena woxen dhim7i ekkidi Asqoroontofe yida Simoona naa Yuhuda barsides.
Ximtoosa, ne hadara ekkidayssa wursa naaga. Xoossa bonchisonta hada duuna lom7u lom7appenne wordo erateth geetettiza asi bappe medhi kessida timirtefe haakka.

Ayhudati qasse ista qanatidi giyan diza wordo asata shiishshidi kumetha dereza ista bolla dentheththidi kataman shiro medhdhida. Phawuloosanne Sillase shiishshidi deraa sinthan essanas issi Iyaasoone geetettizayssaso koyanas elleli bida.

Oonikka ba ishay bana hayqos gathonta nagara ooththishin beyikko izas woosso. Xoossika hayqos gathonta nagara ooththidaytas de7o immana. Hayqos gaththiza nagaraykka dees. Hayqos gaththiza nagara gish woosso giikke.
Ta intes tumu gays; ta kiittidade ekkizadey tana ekkees; tana ekkizadey tana kiittidade ekkees” gides. *
Hessa gish nuni mulekka qaaxonta kawoteth laattana gish ane Xoosse galatoos. Qasseka iza ufaysiza ogera bonchossinne yashshatethan ane izas goynnoos.
Yuuyi yuuyi asappe daydanthi kessiza issi issi Ayhuda asati “Phawuloosi sabakiza Yesusa sunthan inte kezana mala azazays” giidi Goda suntha tuna ayanati oykkida asata bolla xeeygana paacida.
Phawuloosi qas Sillase doorides. Ammanzaytikka Phawuloosa Goda aadho kiyatethas hadara immidappe guye izi istafe shaaketidi bides.
Inte gidikko inte daabura waagappe mela attonta malanne kumeththa woyto ekana mala inte hu7es naagetite.
Isti tinbite yootiza he gallasatan iray bukkonta mala salo gordanas maatay istas dees. Hessathoka haaththata suuthan laammanas koykkokka hara ay mala boshanka biitta shocanas wolqay istas dees. *
Ne woznay Xoossa sinthan suure gidonta gish nees hayssa ha oosozan gishay woykko qaaday deenna.
Taas gididay wurikka neyssa; neyssi wurikka tayssa; takka istan bonchettana.
Wurikka balettidanne issi bolla go7ontayta gidida. Lo7o ooththizay oonikka baawa; issadeykka deenna.
As ubba intefe bollara xeellite attin interka intena doson woykko go7ay baynda galata ekanas issi mishika ooththofte.
He ista bolla xompe woththiza ballata giddon asa naa misatizade demmadis. Izikka hirki toho qirphe gakkiza aduussa may7o may7ides; tira bollakka worqa may7o may7ides.*
Hessafe guye qangeth mulekka deenna. Xoossa algaynne Dorsaa algay he katamayn daana. Iza oosanchati izas goynnana.
Hessa gish wode wursethi matides. Inte minni woossanas dandayana mala wogara diitenne woppu gida qofay intes de7o.
Axaaliyappekka ha7i gakkanaas isti ooththida oosoza hadara istas imettida katama Sooriyan diza Anxokiya markaben gelidi simmida.

Macho ekikkoka nagara gidenna. Geela7oyaka gelikko nagara gidenna. Gido attin ekkiza asatanne gelizayta bolla hayssa alamezan ista daro metoy gakkana. Ta qas hessi inte bolla gakkonta agganayssa dosays.
Gaasoyka nu oletanay ashoranne suuthara gidonta hayssa dhuma alameza haariza godataranne wolqamatara qasseka sallo bolla diza tuna ayana olanchatara olettos.
Inte giddofe oonaska eratethi paccikko oonakka leqqonta ba kiyatethara ubbas immiza Xoossa woosso; izaadeska imettana.
Xillo Ayana tama toyssofte.
Kase nam7u kifilera diza dunkaney giigeti dees. Koyro kifilezan xompe wothizasoynne xaraphezay qasse ukethi dees. Hessa he kifilezi dumma kifile geetettes. *

Ne dure gidana koykko taappe taman paacetida worqa shammana mala neni ne kallotetha yeellatetha kammanas booththa may7o may7ana malanne xeellanaska dandayana mala ayfe dhale shammada ne tiyettana mala ta nena zorays.
Intes Xoossa naan ammanizaytas merna de7oy dizayssa inte erana mala ta hayssa intes xaafays.
Bappe haasayizaddey ba boncho koyees. Kiittidade boncho koyizadey gidikko izi tumancha. Wordoy iza bolla deenna.
Gido attin hayssi gita wolqay nuus Xoossafe imettides attin nuuppe gidontayssa bessana mala hayssi boncho miishay nunan oto misatizayta giddon dees.
Ta siiqoto! Inte halo Xoossi kesso attin interka halo kessofte “Halo kessanay tana gees Goday” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides. *
Yesusikka istas “Ta tarka tana bonchikko ta bonchoy hada. Tana bonchizaddey gidikko inte ‘Izi nu Xoossa’ gizay ta Aawa.
Nuni miza kaththa gish giidi Xoossa ooso ane laallokko. Kaththi wurikka geeshsha. Gido attin hara asas dhuphe gidiza kath muussi bala ooso.
He nam7u asati Yesusa aha ekkidi Ayhudati aha xaaxiza mala shiito puukkidi lee7e may7ora xaaxida.
Inte intes harappe aadhdhiza mernas daana haaroy dizayssa eriza gish qashetidaytas mishetidetanne inte haaroy bonqettishin ufayssan dandaydeta.
Xoossika ba caaqo qaalatho ha addeza zerethafe as ashshizayssa Yesusa Isra7eeles ehides.
Gido attin Geeshsha Maxaafan “Asa ayfey beyontaz, asa haythi siyontaz, asa woznaykka qoppontaz Xoossi ba dosizaytas giigissides” gees. *
Yesusa hayqoppe denthida iza Ayanay inte bolla diza gidikko Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthidayssi inte giddon diza iza ayanay hayqqanas diza inte asatethas de7o immana. *
Nuni Xoossa nayta gididayssa; he Ayanay ba baggara nu ayanara issife nuus markatees.
Baletofte Xoossi qilica erenna. Asi ba zeridaro izo zaari maxana.

Hessa gish Xoossa kiyatethinne iza menxe iitatetha ane xeella. Iza menxe iitatethay kundidayta bolla. Iza kiyatethay qasse inte iza qadhetetha garsan diza wode gakkanaas xalala. Hessi baynda aggikko inteka qanxettana.
Hessa gish ta ishato! Goday ha yaana gakkanaas dandayite. Goshshe goyizaddey biittay lo7o kaththi kaxxana gakkanaas waani dandayizakkonne koyro iranne wursetha ira izi wosti naagizakko ane akeekite.
Heneessifore so asa Goday maaro; aysi giikko izi tana daro wode minthethidessinne; ta sansalatan qasheta dishin tana beydi yeellatibenna.
Hessa gish nayto! Izi qonciza wode nuus xalatethi daana mala izi yiza wodekka nu iza sinthan yeeletonta mala inte izan de7ite.
Hessa gish ta intena Ayanan simeretite; qasseka asho amoka poloppite gays.
Yesus Kirstoosi nagaranchata ashshanas duge hayssa ha alame yides giza qaalay tumanne asi wurikka ekkanas bessizayssa. Nagaranchatappekka aadhdhiza nagaranchay tana.
Hara baggara mino Godaninne iza gita wolqan minnite.
Hessa gish ta minna eqqa days gizaddey diikko kundonta mala baasi naageto.
Gaasoyka issito shiishida yarshon geeyana asata mernas geeshshides.
Ayhudati iza caddanas qasseka shuch denthida.
Gido attin ta inte erana mala koyizay attumasas ubbas hu7ey Kirstoosa gididayssa mala attumasay macasas ubbas hu7e. Qasse Xoossi Kirstoosas hu7e.
Issi issi asati asan kaa7ettida; garafettida; baggayti qasse qasho keeththi gelida. *
Nuka shempo teqe gidida minonne ammanthiza hidota demmidos; he hidotayka magalashazappe guye baggara diza gede Xoossa Keeththa gido gelees.**
Ayfey baynda dhuma oosora intes aykko gagoteththi dooppo. Hessafe iita ooso qonce kessite.

Ta ishato! Inte inte garsan issoy issa mootoppite; ba isha mootizadeynne ba isha bolla pirdizadey woga bolla iita hasayessinne woga bolla pirdees. Histiko ne woga bolla pirdizade attin woga naagizade gidakka.
He tammanne nam7u pengetikka tammanne nam7u inqota. Pengeti wurikka issoy issoy issi inqofe oosettida he katamay giddo ogey mastoote mala haa zaari bessiza muuruta worqafe oosettides.
Kirstoosi gidikko Xoossa Keeththa bolla ammanettida naa mala. Nunikka iza bolla ammanettiza ufayssaynne ceeqqettiza hidota lo7ethi oykikko nu izas duussa keeththa.
Inte siiqotethi qoodheppe qommon gidoppo. Iita gididayssa wursikka ixite. Lo7o gididayssara issife oyketite.

He saateyinka wolqama biitta qaathi handes. He katamas tammafe issi kushey laalettides. Biitta qaatha gaason laapun shi derey hayqqides. Hayqqonta attida asay qas daro babbidessinne salo Xoossaka bonchides. *
Gidikkoka gaannazi issa bagga xalla xeellizade gidenna. Xoossi gidikko issa xalla.
Hessa gish Philaxoosi “Ne taas yootikii? Ta nena kaqqanas woykko birsha yeddanas godateththi taas dizayssa erikii?” gides.
Izi nababiza maxaafay “Izi dorsa mala shukettana laagettides; dorsa laaqay isike qanxizayssa sinthan co7u giza mala hessathoka izi ba duuna pogibenna.
“Hessafe guye derey ba bolla kawo kawoththana mala Sameela woossides; Xoossayka Biniyaame baggafe Qiise naa Sa7oole istas immides. Izikka ista oyddu tammu layth haarides. *
Waayssizaytinne duunan xalala baleththizayti daroti deettes; harappeka heyti qaxxaretida Ayhuda asatappe ammanida asata baggata.
He may7oza bolla oyddu tohoy diza dumma dumma do7ati biittara gooshettiza medhetethatinne salo bolla piradhiza kafoti deettes.
Nuni nu giddon issino gidida mala istika ba giddon issino gidana mala ne taas immida bonchoza takka istas immadis.
Ne taappe siyida timirteza Yesus Kirstoosara issifetethan diza ammanoninne siiqon leemiso histada oykka.
Ayhudatas geesho wogay diza gish usuppun shuchchafe medhettida baathati heen gadan deettes. Istika issoy issoy nam7u oto woykko heedzdzu oto haaththe oykketes.
Woznama gidite; nagara ooththofte; Xoosse erontayta issi issi asati inte garsan diza gish ta hessa intena yeelachanas gays.
Mulekka ashketanne shugota gidite. Issoy issara siiqon diitenne issoy issa dandayite. *
issi issi asata tamappe kessi ashshite; haratas yashshatethan mishetite shin nagaran tunida ista asateth bochchida mayokka wursi ixite.
Xoossi bana dosizaytassinne iza shene mala xeeygetidaytas ubbas ooththiza miish wursikka lo7os ooththizayssa nu eroos.
Inte mishiraachcho qaalas azazettizayta gididayssa asi wuri siydes. Hessika tana daro ufaysides. Gidikkoka inte lo7o hanos cincata qasse iita oosos eeyata gidana mala ta koyays.

Hessa giddon worqafe oosettida exane cuwasiza qeeri shel7e malaynne worqan meeshettida caaqo taabotay dees. He taabotaykka iza giddon mannay diza worqa leematey, cililida Aarone guufeynne caaqo qaalati iza bolla xaafetida shuchcha masethi dees.*
Histin nuni izan ceeqqettiza miishi aazi dizee? Aykko miishanka ceeqqettokko. Nu ceeqqettana gaasoy aazee? Woga naagiza gishee? Gidenna, ammanonna.
Tani ta Aawan, ta Aawayka tanan dizayssa ammanikkii? Ta intes yootiza qaala yootizay ta shene mala deenna; gido attin oosoza wursi ooththizay tanan diza ta Aawa.
Dereyka issi bolla gididi Phawuloosa bollanne Sillase bolla dendides. Deraa ayssizayti Phawuloosanta may7o qaari ekkidi durqara qoxana mala azazida.
Inte inte giddon issoy issara siiqettana mala ta intes ooratha azazo immays. Ta intena siiqida mala inte inte giddon issoy issara siiqetite. *
Nuni izan biitta bolla diza dunkaney laalettikkokka asa kushen gidonta Xoossa kushen oosettida merna keeththi nuus salon dizayssa nu eroos.
Yesusi ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Tana ammanizadey tanan xalala gidonta tana kiittidayssanka ammanees.
Hananiyaykka zaaridi “Godo! Hayssadey Yerusalamen diza geeshshata bolla ay mala iita meto gaththidakkonne ta daro asappe siyadis.
Asay bana dosizadde gidana, miishe siiqizayta, banan ceeqqettizayta, otoranchata, cashshanchata, bana yelidaytas azazetontayta, galatontaytanne geeshshatethi bayndayta,
Nuni iza suuthan geeyidayta gidikko harappeka iza baggara Xoossa hanqofe attana.
Tani Goda Yesusan ammanada miza kaththan tunay bayndayssa eradis. Gido attin issadey issi miish tuna gi qoppikko he miishay izaadesi tuna.
Hayssa ha azazoza ammaniza asa ne qofsikko, ammano qaalaninne ne ekkida lo7o timirtezan minnada Yesus Kirstoosas lo7o oosancha gidandassa.
